metadata.description: Complete Pokemon moves database with all details

pound.name: pound
pound.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
pound.flavorText: The target is physically pounded with a long tail, a foreleg, or the like.

karate-chop.name: karate-chop
karate-chop.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
karate-chop.shortEffect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.
karate-chop.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

double-slap.name: double-slap
double-slap.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.
double-slap.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

comet-punch.name: comet-punch
comet-punch.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.
comet-punch.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

mega-punch.name: mega-punch
mega-punch.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
mega-punch.flavorText: The target is slugged by a punch thrown with muscle-packed power.

pay-day.name: pay-day
pay-day.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  After the battle ends, the winner receives five times the user’s level in extra money for each time this move was used.
pay-day.shortEffect: Scatters money on the ground worth five times the user’s level.
pay-day.flavorText: Coins are hurled at the target to inflict damage. Money is earned after the battle.

fire-punch.name: fire-punch
fire-punch.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
fire-punch.shortEffect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
fire-punch.flavorText: The target is attacked with a fiery punch. This may also leave the target with a burn.

ice-punch.name: ice-punch
ice-punch.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
ice-punch.shortEffect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
ice-punch.flavorText: The target is attacked with an icy punch. This may also leave the target frozen.

thunder-punch.name: thunder-punch
thunder-punch.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.
thunder-punch.shortEffect: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.
thunder-punch.flavorText: The target is attacked with an electrified punch. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

scratch.name: scratch
scratch.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
scratch.flavorText: Hard, pointed, sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.

vice-grip.name: vice-grip
vice-grip.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
vice-grip.flavorText: The target is gripped and squeezed from both sides to inflict damage.

guillotine.name: guillotine
guillotine.effect:
Inflicts damage equal to the target’s max HP.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.  This move’s accuracy is 30% plus 1% for each level the user is higher than the target.  If the user is a lower level than the target, this move will fail.

Because this move inflicts a specific and finite amount of damage, endure still prevents the target from fainting.

The effects of lock on, mind reader, and no guard still apply, as long as the user is equal or higher level than the target.  However, they will not give this move a chance to break through detect or protect.
guillotine.flavorText: A vicious tearing attack with big pincers. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

razor-wind.name: razor-wind
razor-wind.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.  User charges for one turn before attacking.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
razor-wind.shortEffect: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.
razor-wind.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

swords-dance.name: swords-dance
swords-dance.effect: Raises the user’s Attack by two stages.
swords-dance.shortEffect: Raises the user’s Attack by two stages.
swords-dance.flavorText: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. This sharply boosts the user's Attack stat.

cut.name: cut
cut.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
cut.flavorText: The target is cut with a scythe or claw.

gust.name: gust
gust.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.

If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.
gust.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Pokémon in the air.
gust.flavorText: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.

wing-attack.name: wing-attack
wing-attack.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
wing-attack.flavorText: The target is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.

whirlwind.name: whirlwind
whirlwind.effect:
Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random.  Wild battles end immediately.

Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.
whirlwind.shortEffect: Immediately ends wild battles.  Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.
whirlwind.flavorText: The target is blown away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

fly.name: fly
fly.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  User flies high into the air for one turn, becoming immune to attack, and hits on the second turn.

During the immune turn, gust, hurricane, sky uppercut, smack down, thunder, twister, and whirlwind still hit the user normally.  gust and twister also have double power against the user.

The damage from hail and sandstorm still applies during the immune turn.

The user may be hit during its immune turn if under the effect of lock on, mind reader, or no guard.

This move cannot be used while gravity is in effect.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
fly.shortEffect: User flies high into the air, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.
fly.flavorText: The user flies up into the sky on the first turn, then attacks on the next turn.

bind.name: bind
bind.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  For the next 2–5 turns, the target cannot leave the field and is damaged for 1/16 its max HP at the end of each turn.  The user continues to use other moves during this time.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

rapid spin cancels this effect.
bind.shortEffect: Prevents the target from fleeing and inflicts damage for 2-5 turns.
bind.flavorText: A long body, tentacles, or the like are used to bind and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

slam.name: slam
slam.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
slam.flavorText: The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, or the like to inflict damage.

vine-whip.name: vine-whip
vine-whip.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
vine-whip.flavorText: The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.

stomp.name: stomp
stomp.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

Power is doubled against Pokémon that have used minimize since entering the field.
stomp.shortEffect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
stomp.flavorText: The user attacks by stomping on the target with a big foot. This may also make the target flinch.

double-kick.name: double-kick
double-kick.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Hits twice in one turn.
double-kick.flavorText: The user attacks by kicking the target twice in a row using two feet.

mega-kick.name: mega-kick
mega-kick.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
mega-kick.flavorText: The target is attacked by a kick launched with muscle-packed power.

jump-kick.name: jump-kick
jump-kick.effect:
Inflicts regular damage. If this move misses, is blocked by protect or detect, or has no effect, the user takes damage equal to half of its max HP rounded down.

This move cannot be used while gravity is in effect.
jump-kick.shortEffect: If the user misses, it takes half the damage it would have inflicted in recoil.
jump-kick.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

rolling-kick.name: rolling-kick
rolling-kick.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
rolling-kick.shortEffect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
rolling-kick.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

sand-attack.name: sand-attack
sand-attack.effect: Lowers the target’s accuracy by one stage.
sand-attack.shortEffect: Lowers the target’s accuracy by one stage.
sand-attack.flavorText: Sand is hurled in the target's face, lowering the target's accuracy.

headbutt.name: headbutt
headbutt.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
headbutt.shortEffect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
headbutt.flavorText: The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target. This may also make the target flinch.

horn-attack.name: horn-attack
horn-attack.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
horn-attack.flavorText: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed horn to inflict damage.

fury-attack.name: fury-attack
fury-attack.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.
fury-attack.flavorText: The user attacks by jabbing the target with a horn, a beak, or the like. This move hits two to five times in a row.

horn-drill.name: horn-drill

Because this move inflicts a specific and finite amount of damage, endure still prevents the target from fainting.

The effects of lock on, mind reader, and no guard still apply, as long as the user is equal or higher level than the target.  However, they will not give this move a chance to break through detect or protect.
horn-drill.flavorText: The user stabs the target with a horn that rotates like a drill. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

tackle.name: tackle
tackle.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
tackle.flavorText: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

body-slam.name: body-slam
body-slam.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
body-slam.shortEffect: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
body-slam.flavorText: The user attacks by dropping onto the target with its full body weight. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

wrap.effect:

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

take-down.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
take-down.shortEffect: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
take-down.flavorText: A reckless full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. This also damages the user a little.

thrash.name: thrash
thrash.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  User is forced to attack with this move for 2–3 turns,selected at random.  After the last hit, the user becomes confused.

safeguard does not protect against the confusion from this move.
thrash.shortEffect: Hits every turn for 2-3 turns, then confuses the user.
thrash.flavorText: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

double-edge.name: double-edge
double-edge.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
double-edge.shortEffect: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.
double-edge.flavorText: A reckless life-risking tackle in which the user rushes the target. This also damages the user quite a lot.

tail-whip.name: tail-whip
tail-whip.effect: Lowers the target’s Defense by one stage.
tail-whip.shortEffect: Lowers the target’s Defense by one stage.
tail-whip.flavorText: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their Defense stats.

poison-sting.name: poison-sting
poison-sting.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
poison-sting.shortEffect: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
poison-sting.flavorText: The user stabs the target with a poisonous stinger to inflict damage. This may also poison the target.

twineedle.name: twineedle
twineedle.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Hits twice in the same turn.  Has a 20% chance to poison the target.
twineedle.shortEffect: Hits twice in the same turn.  Has a 20% chance to poison the target.
twineedle.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

pin-missile.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.
pin-missile.flavorText: The user attacks by shooting sharp spikes at the target. This move hits two to five times in a row.

leer.name: leer
leer.effect: Lowers the target’s Defense by one stage.
leer.shortEffect: Lowers the target’s Defense by one stage.
leer.flavorText: The user gives opposing Pokémon an intimidating leer that lowers their Defense stats.

bite.name: bite
bite.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
bite.shortEffect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
bite.flavorText: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. This may also make the target flinch.

growl.name: growl
growl.effect: Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.
growl.shortEffect: Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.
growl.flavorText: The user growls in an endearing way, making opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their Attack stats.

roar.name: roar
roar.effect:
Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random.  Wild battles end immediately.

Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.
roar.shortEffect: Immediately ends wild battles.  Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.
roar.flavorText: The target is scared off, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

sing.name: sing
sing.flavorText: A soothing lullaby is sung in a beautiful voice that puts the target to sleep.

supersonic.name: supersonic
supersonic.flavorText: The user generates odd sound waves from its body that confuse the target.

sonic-boom.name: sonic-boom
sonic-boom.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

disable.name: disable
disable.effect: Disables the target’s last used move, preventing its use for 4–7 turns, selected at random, or until the target leaves the field.  If the target hasn’t used a move since entering the field, if it tried to use a move this turn and failed,  if its last used move has 0 PP remaining, or if it already has a move disabled, this move will fail.
disable.shortEffect: Disables the target’s last used move for 1-8 turns.
disable.flavorText: For four turns, the target will be unable to use whichever move it last used.

acid.name: acid
acid.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.
acid.shortEffect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.
acid.flavorText: Opposing Pokémon are attacked with a spray of harsh acid. This may also lower their Sp. Def stats.

ember.name: ember
ember.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
ember.shortEffect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
ember.flavorText: The target is attacked with small flames. This may also leave the target with a burn.

flamethrower.name: flamethrower
flamethrower.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
flamethrower.shortEffect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
flamethrower.flavorText: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.

mist.name: mist
mist.effect:
Pokémon on the user’s side of the field are immune to stat-lowering effects for five turns.

guard swap, heart swap, and power swap may still be used.

defog used by an opponent will end this effect.
mist.shortEffect: Protects the user’s stats from being changed by enemy moves.
mist.flavorText: The user cloaks itself and its allies in a white mist that prevents any of their stats from being lowered for five turns.

water-gun.name: water-gun
water-gun.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
water-gun.flavorText: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

hydro-pump.name: hydro-pump
hydro-pump.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
hydro-pump.flavorText: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

surf.name: surf
surf.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.

If the target is in the first turn of dive, this move will hit with double power.
surf.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dive users.
surf.flavorText: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.

ice-beam.name: ice-beam
ice-beam.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
ice-beam.shortEffect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
ice-beam.flavorText: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. This may also leave the target frozen.

blizzard.name: blizzard
blizzard.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

During hail, this move has 100% accuracy.  It also has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection of protect and detect.
blizzard.shortEffect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
blizzard.flavorText: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon frozen.

psybeam.name: psybeam
psybeam.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.
psybeam.shortEffect: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.
psybeam.flavorText: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. This may also confuse the target.

bubble-beam.name: bubble-beam
bubble-beam.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.
bubble-beam.shortEffect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.
bubble-beam.flavorText: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the target. This may also lower the target's Speed stat.

aurora-beam.name: aurora-beam
aurora-beam.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Attack by one stage.
aurora-beam.shortEffect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Attack by one stage.
aurora-beam.flavorText: The target is hit with a rainbow-colored beam. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.

hyper-beam.name: hyper-beam
hyper-beam.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.
hyper-beam.shortEffect: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.
hyper-beam.flavorText: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user can't move on the next turn.

peck.name: peck
peck.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
peck.flavorText: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn to inflict damage.

drill-peck.name: drill-peck
drill-peck.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
drill-peck.flavorText: A corkscrewing attack that strikes the target with a sharp beak acting as a drill.

submission.name: submission
submission.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
submission.shortEffect: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
submission.flavorText:
The user grabs the target and recklessly dives for
the ground. This also damages the user a little.

low-kick.name: low-kick
low-kick.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Power increases with the target’s weight in kilograms, to a maximum of 120.

Target’s weight | Power
--------------- | ----:
Up to 10kg      |    20
Up to 25kg      |    40
Up to 50kg      |    60
Up to 100kg     |    80
Up to 200kg     |   100
Above 200kg     |   120
low-kick.shortEffect: Inflicts more damage to heavier targets, with a maximum of 120 power.
low-kick.flavorText: A powerful low kick that makes the target fall over. The heavier the target, the greater the move's power.

counter.name: counter
counter.effect:
Targets the last opposing Pokémon to hit the user with a physical move this turn.  Inflicts twice the damage that move did to the user.  If there is no eligible target, this move will fail.  Type immunity applies, but other type effects are ignored.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome.
counter.shortEffect: Inflicts twice the damage the user received from the last physical hit it took.
counter.flavorText: A retaliatory attack that counters any physical move, inflicting double the damage taken.

seismic-toss.name: seismic-toss
seismic-toss.effect: Inflicts damage equal to the user’s level.  Type immunity applies, but other type effects are ignored.
seismic-toss.shortEffect: Inflicts damage equal to the user’s level.
seismic-toss.flavorText: The target is thrown using the power of gravity. It inflicts damage equal to the user's level.

strength.name: strength
strength.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
strength.flavorText: The target is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum power.

absorb.name: absorb
absorb.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
absorb.shortEffect: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
absorb.flavorText: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

mega-drain.name: mega-drain
mega-drain.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
mega-drain.shortEffect: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
mega-drain.flavorText: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

leech-seed.name: leech-seed
leech-seed.effect:
Plants a seed on the target that drains 1/8 of its max HP at the end of every turn and heals the user for the amount taken.  Has no effect on grass Pokémon.  The seed remains until the target leaves the field.

The user takes damage instead of being healed if the target has liquid ooze.

rapid spin will remove this effect.

This effect is passed on by baton pass.
leech-seed.shortEffect: Seeds the target, stealing HP from it every turn.
leech-seed.flavorText: A seed is planted on the target. It steals some HP from the target every turn.

growth.name: growth
growth.effect: Raises the user’s Attack and Special Attack by one stage each.  During sunny day, raises both stats by two stages.
growth.shortEffect: Raises the user’s Attack and Special Attack by one stage.
growth.flavorText: The user's body grows all at once, boosting the Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

razor-leaf.name: razor-leaf
razor-leaf.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
razor-leaf.shortEffect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.
razor-leaf.flavorText: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at opposing Pokémon. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

solar-beam.name: solar-beam
solar-beam.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  User charges for one turn before attacking.

During sunny day, the charge turn is skipped.

During hail, rain dance, or sandstorm, power is halved.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
solar-beam.shortEffect: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.
solar-beam.flavorText: The user gathers light on the first turn, then blasts a bundled beam on the next turn.

poison-powder.name: poison-powder
poison-powder.flavorText: The user scatters a cloud of poisonous dust that poisons the target.

stun-spore.name: stun-spore
stun-spore.flavorText: The user scatters a cloud of numbing powder that paralyzes the target.

sleep-powder.name: sleep-powder
sleep-powder.flavorText: The user scatters a cloud of soporific dust that puts the target to sleep.

petal-dance.flavorText: The user attacks the target by scattering petals for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

string-shot.shortEffect: Lowers the target’s Speed by two stages.
string-shot.flavorText: The user blows silk from its mouth that binds opposing Pokémon and harshly lowers their Speed stats.

dragon-rage.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.

thunder.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

During rain dance, this move has 100% accuracy.  It also has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection of protect and detect.

During sunny day, this move has 50% accuracy.
thunder.shortEffect: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
thunder.flavorText: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

rock-throw.name: rock-throw
rock-throw.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
rock-throw.flavorText: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the target to inflict damage.

earthquake.name: earthquake
earthquake.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.

If the target is in the first turn of dig, this move will hit with double power.
earthquake.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dig users.
earthquake.flavorText: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pokémon around it.

fissure.name: fissure
fissure.effect:
Inflicts damage equal to the target’s max HP.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.  This move’s accuracy is 30% plus 1% for each level the user is higher than the target.  If the user is a lower level than the target, this move will fail.

Because this move inflicts a specific and finite amount of damage, endure still prevents the target from fainting.

The effects of lock on, mind reader, and no guard still apply, as long as the user is equal or higher level than the target.  However, they will not give this move a chance to break through detect or protect.
fissure.flavorText: The user opens up a fissure in the ground and drops the target in. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

dig.name: dig
dig.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  User digs underground for one turn, becoming immune to attack, and hits on the second turn.

During the immune turn, earthquake, fissure, and magnitude still hit the user normally, and their power is doubled if appropriate.

The user may be hit during its immune turn if under the effect of lock on, mind reader, or no guard.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
dig.shortEffect: User digs underground, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.
dig.flavorText: The user burrows into the ground on the first turn, then attacks on the next turn.

toxic.name: toxic
toxic.effect: Badly poisons the target.  Never misses when used by a poison-type Pokémon.
toxic.shortEffect: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.
toxic.flavorText: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.

confusion.name: confusion
confusion.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.
confusion.shortEffect: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.
confusion.flavorText: The target is hit with a weak telekinetic force to inflict damage. This may also confuse the target.

psychic.name: psychic
psychic.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.
psychic.shortEffect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.
psychic.flavorText: The target is hit with a strong telekinetic force to inflict damage. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

hypnosis.name: hypnosis
hypnosis.flavorText: The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make the target fall asleep.

meditate.name: meditate
meditate.effect: Raises the user’s Attack by one stage.
meditate.shortEffect: Raises the user’s Attack by one stage.
meditate.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

agility.name: agility
agility.effect: Raises the user’s Speed by two stages.
agility.shortEffect: Raises the user’s Speed by two stages.
agility.flavorText: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. This sharply boosts its Speed stat.

quick-attack.name: quick-attack
quick-attack.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
quick-attack.flavorText: The user lunges at the target to inflict damage, moving at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

rage.name: rage
rage.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Every time the user is hit after it uses this move but before its next action, its Attack raises by one stage.
rage.shortEffect: If the user is hit after using this move, its Attack rises by one stage.
rage.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

teleport.name: teleport
teleport.effect: Does nothing.  Wild battles end immediately.
teleport.shortEffect: Immediately ends wild battles.  No effect otherwise.
teleport.flavorText: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting, if any. If a wild Pokémon uses this move, it flees.

night-shade.name: night-shade
night-shade.effect: Inflicts damage equal to the user’s level.  Type immunity applies, but other type effects are ignored.
night-shade.shortEffect: Inflicts damage equal to the user’s level.
night-shade.flavorText: The user makes the target see a frightening mirage. It inflicts damage equal to the user's level.

mimic.name: mimic
mimic.effect:
This move is replaced by the target’s last successfully used move, and its PP changes to 5.  If the target hasn’t used a move since entering the field, if it tried to use a move this turn and failed, or if the user already knows the targeted move, this move will fail.  This effect vanishes when the user leaves the field.

If chatter, metronome, mimic, sketch, or struggle is selected, this move will fail.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome, nor forced by encore.
mimic.shortEffect: Copies the target’s last used move.
mimic.flavorText: The user copies the move last used by the target. The copied move can be used until the user of Mimic leaves the battle.

screech.name: screech
screech.effect: Lowers the target’s Defense by two stages.
screech.shortEffect: Lowers the target’s Defense by two stages.
screech.flavorText: An earsplitting screech harshly lowers the target's Defense stat.

double-team.name: double-team
double-team.effect: Raises the user’s evasion by one stage.
double-team.shortEffect: Raises the user’s evasion by one stage.
double-team.flavorText: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to boost its evasiveness.

recover.name: recover
recover.effect: Heals the user for half its max HP.
recover.shortEffect: Heals the user by half its max HP.
recover.flavorText: The user regenerates its cells, restoring its own HP by up to half its max HP.

harden.name: harden
harden.effect: Raises the user’s Defense by one stage.
harden.shortEffect: Raises the user’s Defense by one stage.
harden.flavorText: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to boost its Defense stat.

minimize.name: minimize
minimize.effect:
Raises the user’s evasion by two stages.

stomp and steamroller have double power against Pokémon that have used this move since entering the field.
minimize.shortEffect: Raises the user’s evasion by two stages.
minimize.flavorText: The user compresses its body to make itself look smaller, which sharply boosts its evasiveness.

smokescreen.name: smokescreen
smokescreen.effect: Lowers the target’s accuracy by one stage.
smokescreen.shortEffect: Lowers the target’s accuracy by one stage.
smokescreen.flavorText: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. This lowers the target's accuracy.

confuse-ray.name: confuse-ray
confuse-ray.flavorText: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that causes confusion.

withdraw.name: withdraw
withdraw.effect: Raises the user’s Defense by one stage.
withdraw.shortEffect: Raises the user’s Defense by one stage.
withdraw.flavorText: The user withdraws its body into its hard shell, boosting its Defense stat.

defense-curl.name: defense-curl
defense-curl.effect:
Raises user’s Defense by one stage.

After this move is used, the power of ice ball and rollout are doubled until the user leaves the field.
defense-curl.shortEffect: Raises user’s Defense by one stage.
defense-curl.flavorText: The user curls up and boosts its Defense stat.

barrier.name: barrier
barrier.effect: Raises the user’s Defense by two stages.
barrier.shortEffect: Raises the user’s Defense by two stages.
barrier.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

light-screen.name: light-screen
light-screen.effect:
Erects a barrier around the user’s side of the field that reduces damage from special attacks by half for five turns.  In double battles, the reduction is 1/3.  Critical hits are not affected by the barrier.

If the user is holding light clay, the barrier lasts for eight turns.

brick break or defog used by an opponent will destroy the barrier.
light-screen.shortEffect: Reduces damage from special attacks by 50% for five turns.
light-screen.flavorText: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from special moves for five turns.

haze.name: haze
haze.effect:
Removes stat, accuracy, and evasion modifiers from every Pokémon on the field.

This does not count as a stat reduction for the purposes of clear body or white smoke.
haze.shortEffect: Resets all Pokémon’s stats, accuracy, and evasion.
haze.flavorText: The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.

reflect.name: reflect
reflect.effect:
Erects a barrier around the user’s side of the field that reduces damage from physical attacks by half for five turns.  In double battles, the reduction is 1/3.  Critical hits are not affected by the barrier.

If the user is holding light clay, the barrier lasts for eight turns.

brick break or defog used by an opponent will destroy the barrier.
reflect.shortEffect: Reduces damage from physical attacks by half.
reflect.flavorText: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from physical moves for five turns.

focus-energy.name: focus-energy
focus-energy.effect:
User’s critical hit rate is two levels higher until it leaves the field.  If the user has already used focus energy since entering the field, this move will fail.

This effect is passed on by baton pass.
focus-energy.shortEffect: Increases the user’s chance to score a critical hit.
focus-energy.flavorText: The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that its future attacks have a heightened chance of landing critical hits.

bide.name: bide
bide.effect:
User waits for two turns.  On the second turn, the user inflicts twice the damage it accumulated on the last Pokémon to hit it.  Damage inflicted is typeless.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
bide.shortEffect: User waits for two turns, then hits back for twice the damage it took.
bide.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

metronome.name: metronome
metronome.effect:
Selects any move at random and uses it.  Moves the user already knows are not eligible.  Assist, meta, protection, and reflection moves are also not eligible; specifically, assist, chatter, copycat, counter, covet, destiny bond, detect, endure, feint, focus punch, follow me, helping hand, me first, metronome, mimic, mirror coat, mirror move, protect, quick guard, sketch, sleep talk, snatch, struggle, switcheroo, thief, trick, and wide guard will not be selected by this move.

This move cannot be copied by mimic or mirror move, nor selected by assist, metronome, or sleep talk.
metronome.shortEffect: Randomly selects and uses any move in the game.
metronome.flavorText: The user waggles a finger and stimulates its brain into randomly using nearly any move.

mirror-move.name: mirror-move
mirror-move.effect:
Uses the last move targeted at the user by a Pokémon still on the field.  A move counts as targeting the user even if it hit multiple Pokémon, as long as the user was one of them; however, moves targeting the field itself do not count.  If the user has not been targeted by an appropriate move since entering the field, or if no Pokémon that targeted the user remains on the field, this move will fail.

Moves that failed, missed, had no effect, or were blocked are still copied.

Assist moves, time-delayed moves, “meta” moves that operate on other moves/Pokémon/abilities, and some other special moves cannot be copied and are ignored; if the last move to hit the user was such a move, the previous move will be used instead.  The full list of ignored moves is: acid armor, acupressure, after you, agility, ally switch, amnesia, aqua ring, aromatherapy, aromatic mist, assist, autotomize, barrier, baton pass, belch, belly drum, bide, bulk up, calm mind, camouflage, celebrate, charge, coil, conversion, conversion 2, copycat, cosmic power, cotton guard, counter, crafty shield, curse, defend order, defense curl, destiny bond, detect, doom desire, double team, dragon dance, electric terrain, endure, final gambit, flower shield, focus energy, focus punch, follow me, future sight, geomancy, grassy terrain, gravity, growth, grudge, guard split, hail, happy hour, harden, haze, heal bell, heal order, heal pulse, healing wish, helping hand, hold hands, hone claws, howl, imprison, ingrain, ion deluge, iron defense, kings shield, light screen, lucky chant, lunar dance, magic coat, magnet rise, magnetic flux, mat block, me first, meditate, metronome, milk drink, mimic, minimize, mirror coat, mirror move, mist, misty terrain, moonlight, morning sun, mud sport, nasty plot, nature power, perish song, power split, power trick, protect, psych up, quick guard, quiver dance, rage powder, rain dance, recover, recycle, reflect, reflect type, refresh, rest, rock polish, role play, roost, rototiller, safeguard, sandstorm, shadow blast, shadow bolt, shadow half, shadow rush, shadow shed, shadow sky, shadow storm, shadow wave, sharpen, shell smash, shift gear, sketch, slack off, sleep talk, snatch, soft boiled, spikes, spiky shield, spit up, splash, stealth rock, sticky web, stockpile, struggle, substitute, sunny day, swallow, swords dance, synthesis, tail glow, tailwind, teleport, toxic spikes, transform, water sport, wide guard, wish, withdraw and work up.

This move cannot be selected by assist, metronome, or sleep talk, nor forced by encore.
mirror-move.shortEffect: Uses the target’s last used move.
mirror-move.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

self-destruct.name: self-destruct
self-destruct.effect: User faints, even if the attack fails or misses.  Inflicts regular damage.
self-destruct.flavorText: The user attacks everything around it by causing an explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

egg-bomb.name: egg-bomb
egg-bomb.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
egg-bomb.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.

lick.name: lick
lick.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
lick.shortEffect: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
lick.flavorText: The user licks the target with a long tongue to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

smog.name: smog
smog.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 40% chance to poison the target.
smog.shortEffect: Has a 40% chance to poison the target.
smog.flavorText: The target is attacked with a discharge of filthy gases. This may also poison the target.

sludge.name: sludge
sludge.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
sludge.shortEffect: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
sludge.flavorText: The user hurls unsanitary sludge at the target to inflict damage. This may also poison the target.

bone-club.name: bone-club
bone-club.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to make the target flinch.
bone-club.shortEffect: Has a 10% chance to make the target flinch.
bone-club.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

fire-blast.name: fire-blast
fire-blast.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
fire-blast.shortEffect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
fire-blast.flavorText: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.

waterfall.name: waterfall
waterfall.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.
waterfall.shortEffect: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.
waterfall.flavorText: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch.

clamp.name: clamp
clamp.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  For the next 2–5 turns, the target cannot leave the field and is damaged for 1/16 its max HP at the end of each turn.  The user continues to use other moves during this time.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

rapid spin cancels this effect.
clamp.shortEffect: Prevents the target from fleeing and inflicts damage for 2-5 turns.
clamp.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

swift.name: swift
swift.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
swift.flavorText: Star-shaped rays are shot at opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.

skull-bash.name: skull-bash
skull-bash.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Raises the user’s Defense by one stage.  User then charges for one turn before attacking.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
skull-bash.shortEffect: Raises the user’s Defense by one stage.  User charges for one turn before attacking.
skull-bash.flavorText:
The user tucks in its head to raise its Defense
stat on the first turn, then rams the target on the
next turn.

spike-cannon.name: spike-cannon
spike-cannon.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.
spike-cannon.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

constrict.name: constrict
constrict.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.
constrict.shortEffect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.
constrict.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.

Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

amnesia.name: amnesia
amnesia.effect: Raises the user’s Special Defense by two stages.
amnesia.shortEffect: Raises the user’s Special Defense by two stages.
amnesia.flavorText: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. This sharply boosts the user's Sp. Def stat.

kinesis.name: kinesis
kinesis.effect: Lowers the target’s accuracy by one stage.
kinesis.shortEffect: Lowers the target’s accuracy by one stage.
kinesis.flavorText:
The user distracts the target by bending a spoon.
This lowers the target’s accuracy.

soft-boiled.name: soft-boiled
soft-boiled.effect: Heals the user for half its max HP.
soft-boiled.shortEffect: Heals the user by half its max HP.
soft-boiled.flavorText: The user restores its own HP by up to half its max HP.

high-jump-kick.name: high-jump-kick
high-jump-kick.effect:
Inflicts regular damage. If this move misses, is blocked by protect or detect, or has no effect, the user takes damage equal to half of its max HP rounded down.

This move cannot be used while gravity is in effect.
high-jump-kick.shortEffect: If the user misses, it takes half the damage it would have inflicted in recoil.
high-jump-kick.flavorText: The target is attacked with a knee kick from a jump. If this move misses, the user takes damage instead.

glare.name: glare
glare.flavorText: The user intimidates the target with the pattern on its belly to cause paralysis.

dream-eater.name: dream-eater
dream-eater.effect: Fails if not used on a sleeping Pokémon.  Inflicts regular damage.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
dream-eater.shortEffect: Only works on sleeping Pokémon.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
dream-eater.flavorText: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

poison-gas.name: poison-gas
poison-gas.flavorText: A cloud of poison gas is sprayed in the faces of opposing Pokémon, poisoning those it hits.

barrage.name: barrage
barrage.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.
barrage.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

leech-life.name: leech-life
leech-life.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
leech-life.shortEffect: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
leech-life.flavorText: The user drains the target's blood. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

lovely-kiss.name: lovely-kiss
lovely-kiss.flavorText:
With a scary face, the user tries to force a kiss on
the target. If it succeeds, the target falls asleep.

sky-attack.name: sky-attack
sky-attack.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  User charges for one turn before attacking.  Critical hit chance is one level higher than normal.  Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
sky-attack.shortEffect: User charges for one turn before attacking.  Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
sky-attack.flavorText: The user attacks the turn after using this move. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit and may also make the target flinch.

transform.name: transform
transform.effect:
User copies the target’s species, weight, type, ability, calculated stats (except HP), and moves.  Copied moves will all have 5 PP remaining.  IVs are copied for the purposes of hidden power, but stats are not recalculated.

choice band, choice scarf, and choice specs stay in effect, and the user must select a new move.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor forced by encore.
transform.shortEffect: User becomes a copy of the target until it leaves battle.
transform.flavorText: The user transforms into a copy of the target, right down to having the same move set.

bubble.name: bubble
bubble.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.
bubble.shortEffect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.
bubble.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

dizzy-punch.name: dizzy-punch
dizzy-punch.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.
dizzy-punch.shortEffect: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.
dizzy-punch.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

spore.name: spore
spore.flavorText: The user scatters bursts of spores that induce sleep.

flash.name: flash
flash.effect: Lowers the target’s accuracy by one stage.
flash.shortEffect: Lowers the target’s accuracy by one stage.
flash.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

psywave.name: psywave
psywave.effect: Inflicts typeless damage between 50% and 150% of the user’s level, selected at random in increments of 10%.
psywave.shortEffect: Inflicts damage between 50% and 150% of the user’s level.
psywave.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

splash.name: splash
splash.effect:
Does nothing.

This move cannot be used while gravity is in effect.
splash.flavorText: The user just flops and splashes around to no effect at all...

acid-armor.name: acid-armor
acid-armor.effect: Raises the user’s Defense by two stages.
acid-armor.shortEffect: Raises the user’s Defense by two stages.
acid-armor.flavorText: The user alters its cellular structure to liquefy itself, sharply boosting its Defense stat.

crabhammer.name: crabhammer
crabhammer.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
crabhammer.shortEffect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.
crabhammer.flavorText: The target is hammered with a large pincer. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

explosion.name: explosion
explosion.effect: User faints, even if the attack fails or misses.  Inflicts regular damage.
explosion.flavorText: The user attacks everything around it by causing a tremendous explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

fury-swipes.name: fury-swipes
fury-swipes.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.
fury-swipes.flavorText: The user attacks by raking the target with claws, scythes, or the like. This move hits two to five times in a row.

bonemerang.name: bonemerang
bonemerang.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Hits twice in one turn.
bonemerang.flavorText:
The user throws the bone it holds. The bone loops
around to hit the target twice—coming and going.

rest.name: rest
rest.effect:
User falls to sleep and immediately regains all its HP.  If the user has another major status effect, sleep will replace it.  The user will always wake up after two turns, or one turn with early bird.

This move fails if the Pokémon cannot fall asleep due to uproar, insomnia, or vital spirit.  It also fails if the Pokémon is at full health or is already asleep.
rest.shortEffect: User sleeps for two turns, completely healing itself.
rest.flavorText: The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user's HP and cures any status conditions.

rock-slide.name: rock-slide
rock-slide.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
rock-slide.shortEffect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
rock-slide.flavorText: Large boulders are hurled at opposing Pokémon to inflict damage. This may also make the opposing Pokémon flinch.

hyper-fang.name: hyper-fang
hyper-fang.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to make the target flinch.
hyper-fang.shortEffect: Has a 10% chance to make the target flinch.
hyper-fang.flavorText:
The user bites hard on the target with its sharp
front fangs. This may also make the target flinch.

sharpen.name: sharpen
sharpen.effect: Raises the user’s Attack by one stage.
sharpen.shortEffect: Raises the user’s Attack by one stage.
sharpen.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

conversion.name: conversion
conversion.effect: User’s type changes to the type of one of its moves, selected at random.  hidden power and weather ball are treated as normal.  Only moves with a different type are eligible, and curse is never eligible.  If the user has no suitable moves, this move will fail.
conversion.shortEffect: User’s type changes to the type of one of its moves at random.
conversion.flavorText: The user changes its type to become the same type as the move at the top of the list of moves it knows.

tri-attack.name: tri-attack
tri-attack.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 20% chance to burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.  One of these effects is selected at random; they do not each have independent chances to occur.
tri-attack.shortEffect: Has a 20% chance to burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.
tri-attack.flavorText: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. This may also burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.

super-fang.name: super-fang
super-fang.effect: Inflicts typeless damage equal to half the target’s remaining HP.
super-fang.shortEffect: Inflicts damage equal to half the target’s HP.
super-fang.flavorText: The user chomps hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This cuts the target's HP in half.

slash.name: slash
slash.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
slash.shortEffect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.
slash.flavorText: The target is attacked with a slash of claws, scythes, or the like. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

substitute.name: substitute
substitute.effect:
Transfers 1/4 the user’s max HP into a doll that absorbs damage and causes most negative move effects to fail.  If the user leaves the field, the doll will vanish.  If the user cannot pay the HP cost, this move will fail.

The doll takes damage as normal, using the user’s stats and types, and will break when its HP reaches zero.  Self-inflicted damage from confusion or recoil is not absorbed.  Healing effects from opponents ignore the doll and heal the user as normal.  Moves that work based on the user’s HP still do so; the doll’s HP does not influence any move.

The doll will block major status effects, confusion, and flinching.  The effects of smelling salts and wake up slap do not trigger against a doll, even if the Pokémon behind the doll has the appropriate major status effect.  Multi-turn trapping moves like wrap will hit the doll for their regular damage, but the multi-turn trapping and damage effects will not activate.

Moves blocked or damage absorbed by the doll do not count as hitting the user or inflicting damage for any effects that respond to such, e.g., avalanche, counter, or a rowap berry.  magic coat still works as normal, even against moves the doll would block.  Opposing Pokémon that damage the doll with a leech move like absorb are healed as normal.

It will also block acupressure, block, the curse effect of curse, dream eater, embargo, flatter, gastro acid, grudge, heal block, leech seed, lock on, mean look, mimic, mind reader, nightmare, pain split, psycho shift, spider web, sketch, swagger, switcheroo, trick, worry seed, and yawn.  A Pokémon affected by yawn before summoning the doll will still fall to sleep.

The doll blocks intimidate, but all other abilities act as though the doll did not exist.  If the user has an ability that absorbs moves of a certain type for HP (such as volt absorb absorbing thunder wave), such moves will not be blocked.

life orb and berries that cause confusion still work as normal, but their respective HP loss and confusion are absorbed/blocked by the doll.

The user is still vulnerable to damage inflicted when entering or leaving the field, such as by pursuit or spikes; however, the doll will block the poison effect of toxic spikes.

The doll is passed on by baton pass.  It keeps its existing HP, but uses the replacement Pokémon’s stats and types for damage calculation.

All other effects work as normal.
substitute.shortEffect: Transfers 1/4 of the user’s max HP into a doll, protecting the user from further damage or status changes until it breaks.
substitute.flavorText: The user creates a substitute for itself using some of its own HP. The substitute serves as the user's decoy.

struggle.name: struggle
struggle.effect:
Inflicts typeless regular damage.  User takes 1/4 its max HP in recoil.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.

This move is used automatically when a Pokémon cannot use any other move legally, e.g., due to having no PP remaining or being under the effect of both encore and torment at the same time.

This move’s recoil is not treated as recoil for the purposes of anything that affects recoil, such as the ability rock head.  It also is not prevented by magic guard.

This move cannot be copied by mimic, mirror move, or sketch, nor selected by assist or metronome, nor forced by encore.
struggle.shortEffect: User takes 1/4 its max HP in recoil.
struggle.flavorText:
This attack is used in desperation only if the user
has no PP. It also damages the user a little.

sketch.name: sketch
sketch.effect:
Permanently replaces itself with the target’s last used move.  If that move is chatter or struggle, this move will fail.

This move cannot be copied by mimic or mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome, nor forced by encore.
sketch.shortEffect: Permanently becomes the target’s last used move.
sketch.flavorText: This move enables the user to permanently learn the move last used by the target. Once used, Sketch disappears.

triple-kick.name: triple-kick
triple-kick.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits three times in the same turn.  The second hit has double power, and the third hit has triple power.  Each hit has a separate accuracy check, and this move stops if a hit misses.

skill link does not apply.
triple-kick.shortEffect: Hits three times, increasing power by 100% with each successful hit.
triple-kick.flavorText: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successful hit.

thief.name: thief
thief.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is holding an item and the user is not, the user will permanently take the item.  Damage is still inflicted if an item cannot be taken.

Pokémon with sticky hold or multitype are immune to the item theft effect.

The target cannot recover its item with recycle.

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
thief.flavorText: The user attacks and steals the target's held item simultaneously. The user can't steal anything if it already holds an item.

spider-web.name: spider-web
spider-web.effect:
The target cannot switch out normally.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.  This effect ends when the user leaves the field.

The target may still escape by using baton pass, u turn, or a shed shell.

Both the user and the target pass on this effect with baton pass.
spider-web.shortEffect: Prevents the target from leaving battle.
spider-web.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

mind-reader.name: mind-reader
mind-reader.effect:
If the user targets the same target again before the end of the next turn, the move it uses is guaranteed to hit.  This move itself also ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.

One-hit KO moves are also guaranteed to hit, as long as the user is equal or higher level than the target.  This effect also allows the user to hit Pokémon that are off the field due to moves such as dig or fly.

If the target uses detect or protect while under the effect of this move, the user is not guaranteed to hit, but has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection.

This effect is passed on by baton pass.
mind-reader.shortEffect: Ensures that the user’s next move will hit the target.
mind-reader.flavorText:
The user senses the target’s movements with its
mind to ensure its next attack does not miss
the target.

nightmare.name: nightmare
nightmare.effect: Only works on sleeping Pokémon.  Gives the target a nightmare, damaging it for 1/4 its max HP every turn.  If the target wakes up or leaves the field, this effect ends.
nightmare.shortEffect: Target loses 1/4 its max HP every turn as long as it’s asleep.
nightmare.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

flame-wheel.name: flame-wheel
flame-wheel.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to burn the target.  Frozen Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.
flame-wheel.shortEffect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.  Lets frozen Pokémon thaw themselves.
flame-wheel.flavorText: The user attacks by cloaking itself in fire and charging at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

snore.name: snore
snore.effect: Only usable if the user is sleeping.  Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
snore.shortEffect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.  Only works if the user is sleeping.
snore.flavorText: This attack can be used only if the user is asleep. The harsh noise may also make the target flinch.

curse.name: curse
curse.effect:
If the user is a ghost: user pays half its max HP to place a curse on the target, damaging it for 1/4 its max HP every turn.
Otherwise: Lowers the user’s Speed by one stage, and raises its Attack and Defense by one stage each.

The curse effect is passed on by baton pass.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move.
curse.shortEffect: Ghosts pay half their max HP to hurt the target every turn.  Others decrease Speed but raise Attack and Defense.
curse.flavorText: A move that has different effects depending on whether the user is a Ghost type or not.

flail.name: flail
flail.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Power varies inversely with the user’s proportional remaining HP.

64 * current HP / max HP | Power
-----------------------: | ----:
 0– 1                    |  200
 2– 5                    |  150
 6–12                    |  100
13–21                    |   80
22–42                    |   40
43–64                    |   20
flail.shortEffect: Inflicts more damage when the user has less HP remaining, with a maximum of 200 power.
flail.flavorText: The user flails about aimlessly to attack. The less HP the user has, the greater the move's power.

conversion-2.name: conversion-2
conversion-2.effect: Changes the user’s type to a type either resistant or immune to the last damaging move that hit it.  The new type is selected at random and cannot be a type the user already is.  If there is no eligible new type, this move will fail.
conversion-2.shortEffect: Changes the user’s type to a random type either resistant or immune to the last move used against it.
conversion-2.flavorText: The user changes its type to make itself resistant to the type of the move the target used last.

aeroblast.name: aeroblast
aeroblast.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
aeroblast.shortEffect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.
aeroblast.flavorText: A vortex of air is shot at the target to inflict damage. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

cotton-spore.name: cotton-spore
cotton-spore.effect: Lowers the target’s Speed by two stages.
cotton-spore.shortEffect: Lowers the target’s Speed by two stages.
cotton-spore.flavorText: The user releases cotton-like spores that cling to opposing Pokémon. This harshly lowers their Speed stats.

reversal.name: reversal
reversal.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Power varies inversely with the user’s proportional remaining HP.

64 * current HP / max HP | Power
-----------------------: | ----:
 0– 1                    |  200
 2– 5                    |  150
 6–12                    |  100
13–21                    |   80
22–42                    |   40
43–64                    |   20
reversal.shortEffect: Inflicts more damage when the user has less HP remaining, with a maximum of 200 power.
reversal.flavorText: An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

spite.name: spite
spite.effect: Lowers the PP of the target’s last used move by 4.  If the target hasn’t used a move since entering the field, if it tried to use a move this turn and failed, or if its last used move has 0 PP remaining, this move will fail.
spite.shortEffect: Lowers the PP of the target’s last used move by 4.
spite.flavorText: The user unleashes its grudge on the move last used by the target by cutting 4 PP from it.

powder-snow.name: powder-snow
powder-snow.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
powder-snow.shortEffect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
powder-snow.flavorText: The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. This may also leave opposing Pokémon frozen.

protect.name: protect
protect.effect:
No moves will hit the user for the remainder of this turn.  If the user is last to act this turn, this move will fail.

If the user successfully used detect, endure, protect, quick guard, or wide guard on the last turn, this move has a 50% chance to fail.

lock on, mind reader, and no guard provide a (100 – accuracy)% chance for moves to break through this move.  This does not apply to one-hit KO moves (fissure, guillotine, horn drill, and sheer cold); those are always blocked by this move.

thunder during rain dance and blizzard during hail have a 30% chance to break through this move.

The following effects are not prevented by this move:

* acupressure from an ally
* curse’s curse effect
* Delayed damage from doom desire and future sight; however, these moves will be prevented if they are used this turn
* feint, which will also end this move’s protection after it hits
* imprison
* perish song
* shadow force
* Moves that merely copy the user, such as transform or psych up

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
protect.shortEffect: Prevents any moves from hitting the user this turn.
protect.flavorText: This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

mach-punch.name: mach-punch
mach-punch.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
mach-punch.flavorText: The user throws a punch at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

scary-face.name: scary-face
scary-face.effect: Lowers the target’s Speed by two stages.
scary-face.shortEffect: Lowers the target’s Speed by two stages.
scary-face.flavorText: The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly lower its Speed stat.

feint-attack.name: feint-attack
feint-attack.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
feint-attack.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

sweet-kiss.name: sweet-kiss
sweet-kiss.flavorText: The user kisses the target with a sweet, angelic cuteness that causes confusion.

belly-drum.name: belly-drum
belly-drum.effect: User pays half its max HP to raise its Attack to +6 stages.  If the user cannot pay the HP cost, this move will fail.
belly-drum.shortEffect: User pays half its max HP to max out its Attack.
belly-drum.flavorText: The user maximizes its Attack stat but loses HP equal to half its max HP.

sludge-bomb.name: sludge-bomb
sludge-bomb.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
sludge-bomb.shortEffect: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
sludge-bomb.flavorText: The user hurls unsanitary sludge at the target to inflict damage. This may also poison the target.

mud-slap.name: mud-slap
mud-slap.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.
mud-slap.shortEffect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.
mud-slap.flavorText: The user hurls mud in the target's face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.

octazooka.name: octazooka
octazooka.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.
octazooka.shortEffect: Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.
octazooka.flavorText:
The user attacks by spraying ink in the target’s face
or eyes. This may also lower the target’s accuracy.

spikes.name: spikes
spikes.effect:
Scatters spikes around the opposing field, which damage opposing Pokémon that enter the field for 1/8 of their max HP.  Pokémon immune to ground moves are immune to this damage, except during gravity.  Up to three layers of spikes may be laid down, adding 1/16 to the damage done: two layers of spikes damage for 3/16 max HP, and three layers damage for 1/4 max HP.

wonder guard does not block damage from this effect.

rapid spin removes this effect from its user’s side of the field.  defog removes this effect from its target’s side of the field.
spikes.shortEffect: Scatters Spikes, hurting opposing Pokémon that switch in.
spikes.flavorText: The user lays a trap of spikes at the feet of the opposing team. The spikes will damage opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.

zap-cannon.name: zap-cannon
zap-cannon.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.
zap-cannon.shortEffect: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.
zap-cannon.flavorText: The user attacks by firing an electric blast like a cannon. This also leaves the target with paralysis.

foresight.name: foresight
foresight.effect: Resets the target’s evasion to normal and prevents any further boosting until the target leaves the field.  A ghost under this effect takes normal damage from normal and fighting moves.  This move itself ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
foresight.shortEffect: Forces the target to have no Evade, and allows it to be hit by Normal and Fighting moves even if it’s a Ghost.
foresight.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

destiny-bond.name: destiny-bond
destiny-bond.effect:
If the user faints before its next move, the Pokémon that fainted it will automatically faint.  End-of-turn damage is ignored.

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
destiny-bond.shortEffect: If the user faints this turn, the target automatically will, too.
destiny-bond.flavorText: If the user is knocked out after using this move, the Pokémon that knocked it out will also faint. This move's chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

perish-song.name: perish-song
perish-song.effect:
Every Pokémon is given a counter that starts at 3 and decreases by 1 at the end of every turn, including this one.  When a Pokémon’s counter reaches zero, that Pokémon faints.  A Pokémon that leaves the field will lose its counter; its replacement does not inherit the effect, and other Pokémon’s counters remain.

This effect is passed on by baton pass.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move.
perish-song.shortEffect: User and target both faint after three turns.
perish-song.flavorText: Any Pokémon that hears this song faints in three turns, unless it switches out of battle.

icy-wind.name: icy-wind
icy-wind.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.
icy-wind.shortEffect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.
icy-wind.flavorText: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. This also lowers opposing Pokémon's Speed stats.

detect.name: detect
detect.effect:
No moves will hit the user for the remainder of this turn.  If the user is last to act this turn, this move will fail.

If the user successfully used detect, endure, protect, quick guard, or wide guard on the last turn, this move has a 50% chance to fail.

lock on, mind reader, and no guard provide a (100 – accuracy)% chance for moves to break through this move.  This does not apply to one-hit KO moves (fissure, guillotine, horn drill, and sheer cold); those are always blocked by this move.

thunder during rain dance and blizzard during hail have a 30% chance to break through this move.

The following effects are not prevented by this move:

* acupressure from an ally
* curse’s curse effect
* Delayed damage from doom desire and future sight; however, these moves will be prevented if they are used this turn
* feint, which will also end this move’s protection after it hits
* imprison
* perish song
* shadow force
* Moves that merely copy the user, such as transform or psych up

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
detect.shortEffect: Prevents any moves from hitting the user this turn.
detect.flavorText: This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

bone-rush.name: bone-rush
bone-rush.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.
bone-rush.flavorText: The user attacks by striking the target with a hard bone. This move hits two to five times in a row.

lock-on.name: lock-on
lock-on.effect:
If the user targets the same target again before the end of the next turn, the move it uses is guaranteed to hit.  This move itself also ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.

One-hit KO moves are also guaranteed to hit, as long as the user is equal or higher level than the target.  This effect also allows the user to hit Pokémon that are off the field due to moves such as dig or fly.

If the target uses detect or protect while under the effect of this move, the user is not guaranteed to hit, but has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection.

This effect is passed on by baton pass.
lock-on.shortEffect: Ensures that the user’s next move will hit the target.
lock-on.flavorText: The user takes sure aim at the target. This ensures the user's next move does not miss that target.

outrage.name: outrage
outrage.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  User is forced to attack with this move for 2–3 turns,selected at random.  After the last hit, the user becomes confused.

safeguard does not protect against the confusion from this move.
outrage.shortEffect: Hits every turn for 2-3 turns, then confuses the user.
outrage.flavorText: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

sandstorm.name: sandstorm
sandstorm.effect:
Changes the weather to a sandstorm for five turns.  Pokémon that are not ground, rock, or steel take 1/16 their max HP at the end of every turn.  Every rock Pokémon’s original Special Defense is raised by 50% for the duration of this effect.

solar beam’s power is halved.

moonlight, morning sun, and synthesis only heal 1/4 the user’s max HP.
sandstorm.shortEffect: Changes the weather to a sandstorm for five turns.
sandstorm.flavorText: A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to damage all Pokémon except Rock, Ground, and Steel types. The sandstorm also boosts the Sp. Def stats of Rock types.

giga-drain.name: giga-drain
giga-drain.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
giga-drain.shortEffect: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
giga-drain.flavorText: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

endure.name: endure
endure.effect:
The user’s HP cannot be lowered below 1 by any means for the remainder of this turn.

If the user successfully used detect, endure, protect, quick guard, or wide guard on the last turn, this move has a 50% chance to fail.

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
endure.shortEffect: Prevents the user’s HP from lowering below 1 this turn.
endure.flavorText: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. This move's chance of failing rises if used in succession.

charm.name: charm
charm.effect: Lowers the target’s Attack by two stages.
charm.shortEffect: Lowers the target’s Attack by two stages.
charm.flavorText: The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it less wary. This harshly lowers the target's Attack stat.

rollout.name: rollout
rollout.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  User is forced to use this move for five turns.  Power doubles every time this move is used in succession to a maximum of 16x, and resets to normal after the lock-in ends.  If this move misses or becomes unusable, the lock-in ends.

If the user has used defense curl since entering the field, this move has double power.
rollout.shortEffect: Power doubles every turn this move is used in succession after the first, resetting after five turns.
rollout.flavorText: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. This attack becomes more powerful each time it hits.

false-swipe.name: false-swipe
false-swipe.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Will not reduce the target’s HP below 1.
false-swipe.shortEffect: Cannot lower the target’s HP below 1.
false-swipe.flavorText: A restrained attack that prevents the target from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.

swagger.name: swagger
swagger.effect: Raises the target’s Attack by two stages, then confuses it.  If the target’s Attack cannot be raised by two stages, the confusion is not applied.
swagger.shortEffect: Raises the target’s Attack by two stages and confuses the target.
swagger.flavorText: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, this also sharply boosts the target's Attack stat.

milk-drink.name: milk-drink
milk-drink.effect: Heals the user for half its max HP.
milk-drink.shortEffect: Heals the user by half its max HP.
milk-drink.flavorText: The user restores its own HP by up to half its max HP.

spark.name: spark
spark.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
spark.shortEffect: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
spark.flavorText: The user attacks the target with an electrically charged tackle. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

fury-cutter.name: fury-cutter
fury-cutter.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Power doubles after every time this move is used, whether consecutively or not, maxing out at 16x.  If this move misses or the user leaves the field, power resets.
fury-cutter.shortEffect: Power doubles every turn this move is used in succession after the first, maxing out after five turns.
fury-cutter.flavorText: The user attacks by slashing the target with scythes, claws, or the like. This attack becomes more powerful if it hits in succession.

steel-wing.name: steel-wing
steel-wing.effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to raise the user’s Defense one stage.
steel-wing.shortEffect: Has a 10% chance to raise the user’s Defense by one stage.
steel-wing.flavorText: The target is hit with wings of steel. This may also boost the user's Defense stat.

mean-look.name: mean-look
mean-look.effect:
The target cannot switch out normally.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.  This effect ends when the user leaves the field.

The target may still escape by using baton pass, u turn, or a shed shell.

Both the user and the target pass on this effect with baton pass.
mean-look.shortEffect: Prevents the target from leaving battle.
mean-look.flavorText: The user pins the target with a dark, arresting look. The target becomes unable to flee.

attract.name: attract
