This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

copycat.name: copycat
copycat.effect:
Uses the last move that was used successfully by any Pokémon, including the user.

This move cannot copy itself, nor roar nor whirlwind.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist, metronome, or sleep talk.
copycat.shortEffect: Uses the target’s last used move.
copycat.flavorText: The user mimics the move used immediately before it. The move fails if no other move has been used yet.

power-swap.name: power-swap
power-swap.effect: User swaps its Attack and Special Attack stat modifiers modifiers with the target.
power-swap.shortEffect: User swaps Attack and Special Attack changes with the target.
power-swap.flavorText: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with the target.

guard-swap.name: guard-swap
guard-swap.effect: User swaps its Defense and Special Defense modifiers with the target.
guard-swap.shortEffect: User swaps Defense and Special Defense changes with the target.
guard-swap.flavorText: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Defense and Sp. Def stats with the target.

punishment.name: punishment
punishment.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Power starts at 60 and is increased by 20 for every stage any of the target’s stats has been raised, capping at 200.  Accuracy and evasion modifiers do not increase this move’s power.
punishment.shortEffect: Power increases against targets with more raised stats, up to a maximum of 200.
punishment.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

last-resort.name: last-resort
last-resort.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  This move can only be used if each of the user’s other moves has been used at least once since the user entered the field.  If this is the user’s only move, this move will fail.
last-resort.shortEffect: Can only be used after all of the user’s other moves have been used.
last-resort.flavorText: This move can be used only after the user has used all the other moves it knows in the battle.

worry-seed.name: worry-seed
worry-seed.effect:
Changes the target’s ability to insomnia.

If the target’s ability is truant or multitype, this move will fail.
worry-seed.shortEffect: Changes the target’s ability to Insomnia.
worry-seed.flavorText: A seed that causes worry is planted on the target. It prevents sleep by making the target's Ability Insomnia.

sucker-punch.name: sucker-punch
sucker-punch.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the target has not selected a damaging move this turn, or if the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail.

This move is not affected by iron fist.
sucker-punch.shortEffect: Only works if the target is about to use a damaging move.
sucker-punch.flavorText: This move enables the user to attack first. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack.

toxic-spikes.name: toxic-spikes
toxic-spikes.effect:
Scatters poisoned spikes around the opposing field, which poison opposing Pokémon that enter the field.  A second layer of these spikes may be laid down, in which case Pokémon will be badly poisoned instead.  Pokémon immune to either ground moves or being poisoned are immune to this effect.  Pokémon otherwise immune to ground moves are affected during gravity.

If a poison Pokémon not immune to ground moves enters a field covered with poisoned spikes, the spikes are removed.

rapid spin will remove this effect from its user’s side of the field.  defog will remove this effect from its target’s side of the field.

This move does not trigger synchronize, unless the Pokémon with synchronize was forced to enter the field by another effect such as roar.

Pokémon entering the field due to baton pass are not affected by this effect.
toxic-spikes.shortEffect: Scatters poisoned spikes, poisoning opposing Pokémon that switch in.
toxic-spikes.flavorText: The user lays a trap of poison spikes at the feet of the opposing team. The spikes will poison opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.

heart-swap.name: heart-swap
heart-swap.effect: User swaps its stat modifiers with the target.
heart-swap.shortEffect: User and target swap stat changes.
heart-swap.flavorText: The user employs its psychic power to switch stat changes with the target.

aqua-ring.name: aqua-ring
aqua-ring.effect:
Restores 1/16 of the user’s max HP at the end of each turn.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

This effect is passed on by baton pass.
aqua-ring.shortEffect: Restores 1/16 of the user’s max HP each turn.
aqua-ring.flavorText: The user envelops itself in a veil made of water. It regains some HP every turn.

magnet-rise.name: magnet-rise
magnet-rise.effect:
For five turns, the user is immune to ground moves.

If the user is under the effect of ingrain or has levitate, this move will fail.

This effect is temporarily disabled by and cannot be used during gravity.

This effect is passed on by baton pass.
magnet-rise.shortEffect: User is immune to Ground moves and effects for five turns.
magnet-rise.flavorText: The user levitates using electrically generated magnetism for five turns.

flare-blitz.name: flare-blitz
flare-blitz.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.  Has a 10% chance to burn the target.  Frozen Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.
flare-blitz.shortEffect: User takes 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.  Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
flare-blitz.flavorText: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges the target to inflict damage. This also damages the user quite a lot and may leave the target with a burn.

force-palm.name: force-palm
force-palm.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
force-palm.shortEffect: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
force-palm.flavorText: The target is attacked with a shock wave. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

aura-sphere.name: aura-sphere
aura-sphere.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
aura-sphere.flavorText: The user lets loose a pulse of aura power from deep within its body at the target. This attack never misses.

rock-polish.name: rock-polish
rock-polish.effect: Raises the user’s Speed by two stages.
rock-polish.shortEffect: Raises the user’s Speed by two stages.
rock-polish.flavorText: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. This sharply boosts the user's Speed stat.

poison-jab.name: poison-jab
poison-jab.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
poison-jab.shortEffect: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
poison-jab.flavorText: The target is stabbed with a tentacle, an arm, or the like steeped in poison. This may also poison the target.

dark-pulse.name: dark-pulse
dark-pulse.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.
dark-pulse.shortEffect: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.
dark-pulse.flavorText: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with ill intent. This may also make the target flinch.

night-slash.name: night-slash
night-slash.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
night-slash.shortEffect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.
night-slash.flavorText: The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

aqua-tail.name: aqua-tail
aqua-tail.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
aqua-tail.flavorText: The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

seed-bomb.name: seed-bomb
seed-bomb.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
seed-bomb.flavorText: The user attacks by slamming a barrage of hard-shelled seeds down on the target from above.

air-slash.name: air-slash
air-slash.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
air-slash.shortEffect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
air-slash.flavorText: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. This may also make the target flinch.

x-scissor.name: x-scissor
x-scissor.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
x-scissor.flavorText: The user slashes at the target by crossing its scythes, claws, or the like as if they were a pair of scissors.

bug-buzz.name: bug-buzz
bug-buzz.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.
bug-buzz.shortEffect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.
bug-buzz.flavorText: The user vibrates to generate a damaging sound wave. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

dragon-pulse.name: dragon-pulse
dragon-pulse.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
dragon-pulse.flavorText: The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth.

dragon-rush.name: dragon-rush
dragon-rush.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.
dragon-rush.shortEffect: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.
dragon-rush.flavorText: The user tackles the target while exhibiting overwhelming menace. This may also make the target flinch.

power-gem.name: power-gem
power-gem.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
power-gem.flavorText: The user attacks with a ray of light that sparkles as if it were made of gemstones.

drain-punch.name: drain-punch
drain-punch.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
drain-punch.shortEffect: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
drain-punch.flavorText: The user attacks with an energy-draining punch. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

vacuum-wave.name: vacuum-wave
vacuum-wave.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
vacuum-wave.flavorText: The user whirls its fists to send a wave of pure vacuum at the target. This move always goes first.

focus-blast.name: focus-blast
focus-blast.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.
focus-blast.shortEffect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.
focus-blast.flavorText: The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes its power. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

energy-ball.name: energy-ball
energy-ball.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.
energy-ball.shortEffect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.
energy-ball.flavorText: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

brave-bird.name: brave-bird
brave-bird.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
brave-bird.shortEffect: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.
brave-bird.flavorText: The user tucks in its wings and charges at a low altitude. This also damages the user quite a lot.

earth-power.name: earth-power
earth-power.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.
earth-power.shortEffect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.
earth-power.flavorText: The user makes the ground under the target erupt with power. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

switcheroo.name: switcheroo
switcheroo.effect:
User and target permanently swap held items.  Works even if one of the Pokémon isn’t holding anything.  If either Pokémon is holding mail, this move will fail.

If either Pokémon has multitype or sticky hold, this move will fail.

If this move results in a Pokémon obtaining choice band, choice scarf, or choice specs, and that Pokémon was the latter of the pair to move this turn, then the move it used this turn becomes its chosen forced move.  This applies even if both Pokémon had a choice item before this move was used.  If the first of the two Pokémon gains a choice item, it may select whatever choice move it wishes next turn.

Neither the user nor the target can recover its item with recycle.

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
switcheroo.flavorText: The user trades held items with the target faster than the eye can follow.

giga-impact.name: giga-impact
giga-impact.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.
giga-impact.shortEffect: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.
giga-impact.flavorText: The user charges at the target using every bit of its power. The user can't move on the next turn.

nasty-plot.name: nasty-plot
nasty-plot.effect: Raises the user’s Special Attack by two stages.
nasty-plot.shortEffect: Raises the user’s Special Attack by two stages.
nasty-plot.flavorText: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. This sharply boosts the user's Sp. Atk stat.

bullet-punch.name: bullet-punch
bullet-punch.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
bullet-punch.flavorText: The user strikes the target with tough punches as fast as bullets. This move always goes first.

avalanche.name: avalanche
avalanche.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the target damaged the user this turn and was the last to do so, this move has double power.

pain split does not count as damaging the user.
avalanche.shortEffect: Inflicts double damage if the user takes damage before attacking this turn.
avalanche.flavorText: This move's power is doubled if the target has inflicted damage on the user in the same turn.

ice-shard.name: ice-shard
ice-shard.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
ice-shard.flavorText: The user flash-freezes chunks of ice and hurls them at the target. This move always goes first.

shadow-claw.name: shadow-claw
shadow-claw.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
shadow-claw.shortEffect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.
shadow-claw.flavorText: The user attacks by slashing the target with a sharp claw made from shadows. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

thunder-fang.name: thunder-fang
thunder-fang.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target and a separate 10% chance to make the target flinch.
thunder-fang.shortEffect: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target and a 10% chance to make the target flinch.
thunder-fang.flavorText: The user bites with electrified fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with paralysis.

ice-fang.name: ice-fang
ice-fang.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to freeze the target and a separate 10% chance to make the target flinch.
ice-fang.shortEffect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target and a 10% chance to make the target flinch.
ice-fang.flavorText: The user bites with cold-infused fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it frozen.

fire-fang.name: fire-fang
fire-fang.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to burn the target and a separate 10% chance to make the target flinch.
fire-fang.shortEffect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target and a 10% chance to make the target flinch.
fire-fang.flavorText: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with a burn.

shadow-sneak.name: shadow-sneak
shadow-sneak.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
shadow-sneak.flavorText: The user extends its shadow and attacks the target from behind. This move always goes first.

mud-bomb.name: mud-bomb
mud-bomb.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.
mud-bomb.shortEffect: Has a 30% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.
mud-bomb.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

psycho-cut.name: psycho-cut
psycho-cut.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
psycho-cut.shortEffect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.
psycho-cut.flavorText: The user tears at the target with blades formed by psychic power. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

zen-headbutt.name: zen-headbutt
zen-headbutt.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.
zen-headbutt.shortEffect: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.
zen-headbutt.flavorText: The user focuses its willpower to its head and attacks the target. This may also make the target flinch.

mirror-shot.name: mirror-shot
mirror-shot.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.
mirror-shot.shortEffect: Has a 30% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.
mirror-shot.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

flash-cannon.name: flash-cannon
flash-cannon.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.
flash-cannon.shortEffect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.
flash-cannon.flavorText: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it at once. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

rock-climb.name: rock-climb
rock-climb.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.
rock-climb.shortEffect: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.
rock-climb.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

defog.name: defog
defog.effect:
Lowers the target’s evasion by one stage.  Clears away fog.  Removes the effects of mist, light screen, reflect, safeguard, spikes, stealth rock, and toxic spikes from the target’s side of the field.

If the target is protected by mist, it will prevent the evasion change, then be removed by this move.
defog.shortEffect: Lowers the target’s evasion by one stage.  Removes field effects from the enemy field.
defog.flavorText: A strong wind blows away the target's barriers such as Reflect or Light Screen. This also lowers the target's evasiveness.

trick-room.name: trick-room
trick-room.effect:
For five turns (including this one), slower Pokémon will act before faster Pokémon.  Move priority is not affected.  Using this move when its effect is already active will end the effect.

Pokémon holding full incense, lagging tail, or quick claw and Pokémon with stall ignore this effect.
trick-room.shortEffect: For five turns, slower Pokémon will act before faster Pokémon.
trick-room.flavorText: The user creates a bizarre area in which slower Pokémon get to move first for five turns.

draco-meteor.name: draco-meteor
draco-meteor.effect: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages.
draco-meteor.shortEffect: Lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.
draco-meteor.flavorText: Comets are summoned down from the sky onto the target. The recoil from this move harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

discharge.name: discharge
discharge.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
discharge.shortEffect: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
discharge.flavorText: The user strikes everything around it by letting loose a flare of electricity. This may also leave those hit by the attack with paralysis.

lava-plume.name: lava-plume
lava-plume.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to burn the target.
lava-plume.shortEffect: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.
lava-plume.flavorText: The user torches everything around it in an inferno of scarlet flames. This may also leave those it hits with a burn.

leaf-storm.name: leaf-storm
leaf-storm.effect: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages.
leaf-storm.shortEffect: Lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.
leaf-storm.flavorText: The user whips up a storm of leaves around the target. The recoil from this move harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.

power-whip.name: power-whip
power-whip.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
power-whip.flavorText: The user violently whirls its vines, tentacles, or the like to lash the target.

rock-wrecker.name: rock-wrecker
rock-wrecker.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.
rock-wrecker.shortEffect: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.
rock-wrecker.flavorText: The user launches a huge boulder at the target to attack. The user can't move on the next turn.

cross-poison.name: cross-poison
cross-poison.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move. Has a 10% chance to poison the target.
cross-poison.shortEffect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit and a 10% chance to poison the target.
cross-poison.flavorText: A slashing attack with a poisonous blade that may also poison the target. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

gunk-shot.name: gunk-shot
gunk-shot.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
gunk-shot.shortEffect: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
gunk-shot.flavorText: The user shoots filthy garbage at the target to attack. This may also poison the target.

iron-head.name: iron-head
iron-head.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
iron-head.shortEffect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
iron-head.flavorText: The user slams the target with its steel-hard head. This may also make the target flinch.

magnet-bomb.name: magnet-bomb
magnet-bomb.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
magnet-bomb.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

stone-edge.name: stone-edge
stone-edge.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
stone-edge.shortEffect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.
stone-edge.flavorText: The user stabs the target with sharpened stones. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

captivate.name: captivate
captivate.effect: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages.  If the user and target are the same gender, or either is genderless, this move will fail.
captivate.shortEffect: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages if it’s the opposite gender.
captivate.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

stealth-rock.name: stealth-rock
stealth-rock.effect:
Spreads sharp rocks around the opposing field, damaging any Pokémon that enters the field for 1/8 its max HP.  This damage is affected by the entering Pokémon’s susceptibility to rock moves.

rapid spin removes this effect from its user’s side of the field.
stealth-rock.shortEffect: Causes damage when opposing Pokémon switch in.
stealth-rock.flavorText: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the opposing team. The trap damages opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.

grass-knot.name: grass-knot
grass-knot.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Power increases with the target’s weight in kilograms, to a maximum of 120.

Target’s weight | Power
--------------- | ----:
Up to 10kg      |    20
Up to 25kg      |    40
Up to 50kg      |    60
Up to 100kg     |    80
Up to 200kg     |   100
Above 200kg     |   120
grass-knot.shortEffect: Inflicts more damage to heavier targets, with a maximum of 120 power.
grass-knot.flavorText: The user snares the target with grass and trips it. The heavier the target, the greater the move's power.

chatter.name: chatter
chatter.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Has either a 1%, 11%, or 31% chance to confuse the target, based on the volume of the recording made for this move; louder recordings increase the chance of confusion.  If the user is not a chatot, this move will not cause confusion.

This move cannot be copied by mimic, mirror move, or sketch, nor selected by assist, metronome, or sleep talk.
chatter.shortEffect: Has a higher chance to confuse the target when the recorded sound is louder.
chatter.flavorText:
The user attacks the target with sound waves of
deafening chatter. This confuses the target.

judgment.name: judgment
judgment.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the user is holding a plate or a drive, this move’s type is the type corresponding to that item.

Note: This effect is technically shared by both techno blast and judgment; however, Techno Blast is only affected by drives, and Judgment is only affected by plates.
judgment.shortEffect: If the user is holding a appropriate plate or drive, the damage inflicted will match it.
judgment.flavorText: The user releases countless shots of light at the target. This move's type changes depending on the kind of plate held by the user.

bug-bite.name: bug-bite
bug-bite.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is holding a berry, this move has double power, and the user takes the berry and uses it immediately.

If the target is holding a jaboca berry or rowap berry, the berry is still removed, but has no effect.

If this move is super effective and the target is holding a berry that can reduce this move’s damage, it will do so, and will not be stolen.
bug-bite.shortEffect: If target has a berry, inflicts double damage and uses the berry.
bug-bite.flavorText: The user attacks by biting the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

charge-beam.name: charge-beam
charge-beam.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 70% chance to raise the user’s Special Attack by one stage.
charge-beam.shortEffect: Has a 70% chance to raise the user’s Special Attack by one stage.
charge-beam.flavorText: The user attacks the target with an electric charge. The residual electricity may also boost the user's Sp. Atk stat.

wood-hammer.name: wood-hammer
wood-hammer.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
wood-hammer.shortEffect: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.
wood-hammer.flavorText: The user slams its rugged body into the target to attack. This also damages the user quite a lot.

aqua-jet.name: aqua-jet
aqua-jet.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
aqua-jet.flavorText: The user lunges at the target to inflict damage, moving at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

attack-order.name: attack-order
attack-order.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
attack-order.shortEffect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.
attack-order.flavorText: The user calls out its underlings to pummel the target. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

defend-order.name: defend-order
defend-order.effect: Raises the user’s Defense and Special Defense by one stage.
defend-order.shortEffect: Raises the user’s Defense and Special Defense by one stage.
defend-order.flavorText: The user calls out its underlings to shield its body, boosting its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

heal-order.name: heal-order
heal-order.effect: Heals the user for half its max HP.
heal-order.shortEffect: Heals the user by half its max HP.
heal-order.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

head-smash.name: head-smash
head-smash.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/2 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
head-smash.shortEffect: User receives 1/2 the damage inflicted in recoil.
head-smash.flavorText: The user attacks the target with a hazardous full-power headbutt. This also damages the user terribly.

double-hit.name: double-hit
double-hit.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Hits twice in one turn.
double-hit.flavorText: The user slams the target with a tail or the like. The target is hit twice in a row.

roar-of-time.name: roar-of-time
roar-of-time.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.
roar-of-time.shortEffect: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.
roar-of-time.flavorText: The user blasts the target with power that distorts even time. The user can't move on the next turn.

spacial-rend.name: spacial-rend
spacial-rend.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
spacial-rend.shortEffect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.
spacial-rend.flavorText: The user tears the target along with the space around it. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

lunar-dance.name: lunar-dance
lunar-dance.effect: User faints.  Its replacement’s HP and PP are fully restored, and any major status effect is removed.
lunar-dance.shortEffect: User faints, and its replacement is fully healed.
lunar-dance.flavorText: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its HP and PP restored and its status conditions cured.

crush-grip.name: crush-grip
crush-grip.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Power directly relates to the target’s relative remaining HP, given by `1 + 120 * current HP / max HP`, to a maximum of 121.
crush-grip.shortEffect: Power increases against targets with more HP remaining, up to a maximum of 121 power.
crush-grip.flavorText: The target is crushed with great force. The more HP the target has left, the greater the move's power.

magma-storm.name: magma-storm
magma-storm.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  For the next 2–5 turns, the target cannot leave the field and is damaged for 1/16 its max HP at the end of each turn.  The user continues to use other moves during this time.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

rapid spin cancels this effect.
magma-storm.shortEffect: Prevents the target from fleeing and inflicts damage for 2-5 turns.
magma-storm.flavorText: The user traps the target inside a maelstrom of fire that inflicts damage for four to five turns.

dark-void.name: dark-void
dark-void.flavorText: Opposing Pokémon are dragged into a world of total darkness that puts them to sleep.

seed-flare.name: seed-flare
seed-flare.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 40% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by two stages.
seed-flare.shortEffect: Has a 40% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by two stages.
seed-flare.flavorText: The user emits a shock wave from its body to attack its target. This may also harshly lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

ominous-wind.name: ominous-wind
ominous-wind.effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to raise all of the user’s stats one stage.
ominous-wind.shortEffect: Has a 10% chance to raise all of the user’s stats by one stage.
ominous-wind.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

shadow-force.name: shadow-force
shadow-force.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  User vanishes for one turn, becoming immune to attack, and hits on the second turn.

This move ignores the effects of detect and protect.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
shadow-force.shortEffect: User vanishes, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.  Hits through Protect and Detect.
shadow-force.flavorText: The user disappears on the first turn, then attacks on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

hone-claws.name: hone-claws
hone-claws.effect: Raises the user’s Attack and accuracy by one stage.
hone-claws.shortEffect: Raises the user’s Attack and accuracy by one stage.
hone-claws.flavorText: The user sharpens its claws to boost its Attack stat and accuracy.

wide-guard.name: wide-guard
wide-guard.effect:
Moves with multiple targets will not hit friendly Pokémon for the remainder of this turn.  If the user is last to act this turn, this move will fail.

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
wide-guard.shortEffect: Prevents any multi-target moves from hitting friendly Pokémon this turn.
wide-guard.flavorText: The user and its allies are protected from wide-ranging attacks for one turn.

guard-split.name: guard-split
guard-split.effect: Averages the user’s unmodified Defense with the target’s unmodified Defense; the value becomes the unmodified Defense for both Pokémon. Unmodified Special Defense is averaged the same way.
guard-split.shortEffect: Averages Defense and Special Defense with the target.
guard-split.flavorText: The user employs its psychic power to average its Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of the target.

power-split.name: power-split
power-split.effect:
Averages the user’s unmodified Attack with the target’s unmodified Attack; the value becomes the unmodified Attack for both Pokémon. Unmodified Special Attack is averaged the same way.

This effect applies before any other persistent changes to unmodified Attack or Special Attack, such as flower gift during sunny day.
power-split.shortEffect: Averages Attack and Special Attack with the target.
power-split.flavorText: The user employs its psychic power to average its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with those of the target.

wonder-room.name: wonder-room
wonder-room.effect: For five turns (including this one), every Pokémon’s Defense and Special Defense are swapped.
wonder-room.shortEffect: All Pokémon’s Defense and Special Defense are swapped for 5 turns.
wonder-room.flavorText: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon's Defense and Sp. Def stats are swapped for five turns.

psyshock.name: psyshock
psyshock.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Damage calculation always uses the target’s Defense, regardless of this move’s damage class.
psyshock.shortEffect: Inflicts damage based on the target’s Defense, not Special Defense.
psyshock.flavorText: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This move deals physical damage.

venoshock.name: venoshock
venoshock.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is poisoned, this move has double power.
venoshock.shortEffect: Inflicts double damage if the target is Poisoned.
venoshock.flavorText: The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. This move's power is doubled if the target is poisoned.

autotomize.name: autotomize
autotomize.effect: Raises the user’s Speed by two stages.  Halves the user’s weight; this effect does not stack.
autotomize.shortEffect: Raises the user’s Speed by two stages and halves the user’s weight.
autotomize.flavorText:
The user sheds part of its body to make itself lighter
and sharply raise its Speed stat.

rage-powder.name: rage-powder
rage-powder.effect:
Until the end of this turn, any moves that opposing Pokémon target solely at the user’s ally will instead target the user.  If both Pokémon on the same side of the field use this move on the same turn, the Pokémon that uses it last will become the target.

This effect takes priority over lightning rod and storm drain.

If the user’s ally switches out, opposing Pokémon may still hit it with pursuit.

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
rage-powder.shortEffect: Redirects the target’s single-target effects to the user for this turn.
rage-powder.flavorText: The user scatters a cloud of irritating powder to draw attention to itself. Opposing Pokémon aim only at the user.

telekinesis.name: telekinesis
telekinesis.effect:
For three turns (including this one), moves used against the target have 100% accuracy, but the target is immune to ground damage.  Accuracy of one-hit KO moves is exempt from this effect.

This effect is removed by gravity.  If Gravity is already in effect, this move will fail.
telekinesis.shortEffect: Moves have 100% accuracy against the target for three turns.
telekinesis.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

magic-room.name: magic-room
magic-room.effect: For five turns (including this one), passive effects of held items are ignored, and Pokémon will not use their held items.
magic-room.shortEffect: Negates held items for five turns.
magic-room.flavorText: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon's held items lose their effects for five turns.

smack-down.name: smack-down
smack-down.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Removes the target’s immunity to ground-type damage.  This effect removes any existing Ground immunity due to levitate, magnet rise, or telekinesis, and causes the target’s flying type to be ignored when it takes Ground damage.

If the target isn’t immune to Ground damage, this move will fail.

This move can hit Pokémon under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, and ends the effect of Bounce or Fly.
smack-down.shortEffect: Removes any immunity to Ground damage.
smack-down.flavorText: The user throws a stone or similar projectile to attack the target. If the target is in the air, it will be knocked down to the ground.

storm-throw.name: storm-throw
storm-throw.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Always scores a critical hit.
storm-throw.flavorText:
The user strikes the target with a fierce blow. This
attack always results in a critical hit.

flame-burst.name: flame-burst
flame-burst.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If this move successfully hits the target, any Pokémon adjacent to the target are damaged for 1/16 their max HP.
flame-burst.shortEffect: Deals splash damage to Pokémon next to the target.
flame-burst.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

sludge-wave.name: sludge-wave
sludge-wave.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to poison the target.
sludge-wave.shortEffect: Has a 10% chance to poison the target.
sludge-wave.flavorText: The user strikes everything around it by swamping the area with a giant sludge wave. This may also poison those it hits.

quiver-dance.name: quiver-dance
quiver-dance.effect: Raises the user’s Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.
quiver-dance.shortEffect: Raises the user’s Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.
quiver-dance.flavorText: The user lightly performs a beautiful, mystic dance. This boosts the user's Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

heavy-slam.name: heavy-slam
heavy-slam.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  The greater the user’s weight compared to the target’s, the higher power this move has, to a maximum of 120.

User’s weight                    | Power
-------------------------------- | ----:
Up to 2× the target’s weight     |    40
Up to 3× the target’s weight     |    60
Up to 4× the target’s weight     |    80
Up to 5× the target’s weight     |   100
More than 5× the target’s weight |   120
heavy-slam.shortEffect: Power is higher when the user weighs more than the target, up to a maximum of 120.
heavy-slam.flavorText: The user slams into the target with its heavy body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater the move's power.

synchronoise.name: synchronoise
synchronoise.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Only Pokémon that share a type with the user will take damage from this move.
synchronoise.shortEffect: Hits any Pokémon that shares a type with the user.
synchronoise.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

electro-ball.name: electro-ball
electro-ball.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  The greater the user’s Speed compared to the target’s, the higher power this move has, to a maximum of 150.

User’s Speed                     | Power
-------------------------------- | ----:
Up to 2× the target’s Speed      |    60
Up to 3× the target’s Speed      |    80
Up to 4× the target’s Speed      |   120
More than 4× the target’s Speed  |   150
electro-ball.shortEffect: Power is higher when the user has greater Speed than the target, up to a maximum of 150.
electro-ball.flavorText: The user hurls an electric orb at the target. The faster the user is than the target, the greater the move's power.

soak.name: soak
soak.effect: Changes the target to pure water-type until it leaves the field.  If the target has multitype, this move will fail.
soak.shortEffect: Changes the target’s type to Water.
soak.flavorText: The user shoots a torrent of water that changes the target's type to Water.

flame-charge.name: flame-charge
flame-charge.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Raises the user’s Speed by one stage.
flame-charge.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage.  Raises the user’s Speed by one stage.
flame-charge.flavorText: Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks the target. Then, building up momentum, the user boosts its Speed stat.

coil.name: coil
coil.effect: Raises the user’s Attack, Defense, and accuracy by one stage each.
coil.shortEffect: Raises the user’s Attack, Defense, and accuracy by one stage each.
coil.flavorText: The user coils up and concentrates. This boosts its Attack and Defense stats as well as its accuracy.

low-sweep.name: low-sweep
low-sweep.effect: Lowers the target’s Speed by one stage.
low-sweep.shortEffect: Lowers the target’s Speed by one stage.
low-sweep.flavorText: The user makes a swift attack on the target's legs, which lowers the target's Speed stat.

acid-spray.name: acid-spray
acid-spray.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Lowers the target’s Special Defense by two stages.
acid-spray.shortEffect: Lowers the target’s Special Defense by two stages.
acid-spray.flavorText: The user attacks by spitting fluid that works to melt the target. This also harshly lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.

foul-play.name: foul-play
foul-play.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Damage is calculated using the target’s attacking stat rather than the user’s.
foul-play.shortEffect: Calculates damage with the target’s attacking stat.
foul-play.flavorText: The user turns the target's strength against it. The higher the target's Attack stat, the greater the damage this move inflicts.

simple-beam.name: simple-beam
simple-beam.effect: Changes the target’s ability to simple.
simple-beam.shortEffect: Changes the target’s ability to Simple.
simple-beam.flavorText: The user emits a mysterious psychic wave that changes the target's Ability to Simple.

entrainment.name: entrainment
entrainment.effect: Changes the target’s ability to match the user’s.  This effect ends when the target leaves battle.
entrainment.shortEffect: Copies the user’s ability onto the target.
entrainment.flavorText: The user dances with an odd rhythm that compels the target to mimic it, making the target's Ability the same as the user's.

after-you.name: after-you
after-you.effect:
The target will act next this turn, regardless of Speed or move priority.
If the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail.
after-you.shortEffect: Makes the target act next this turn.
after-you.flavorText: The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user.

round.name: round
round.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If round has already been used this turn, this move’s power is doubled.  After this move is used, any other Pokémon using it this turn will immediately do so (in the order they would otherwise act), regardless of Speed or priority.  Pokémon using other moves will then continue to act as usual.
round.shortEffect: Has double power if it’s used more than once per turn.
round.flavorText: The user attacks the target with a song. If others use this move, they will act immediately after the initial user, and the power of their Rounds will be boosted.

echoed-voice.name: echoed-voice
echoed-voice.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If any friendly Pokémon used this move earlier this turn or on the previous turn, that use’s power is added to this move’s power, to a maximum of 200.
echoed-voice.shortEffect: Power increases by 100% for each consecutive use by any friendly Pokémon, to a maximum of 200.
echoed-voice.flavorText: The user attacks the target with an echoing voice. If this move is used consecutively by any Pokémon, its power is boosted.

chip-away.name: chip-away
chip-away.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Damage calculation ignores the target’s stat modifiers, including evasion.
chip-away.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

clear-smog.name: clear-smog
clear-smog.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  All of the target’s stat modifiers are reset to zero.
clear-smog.shortEffect: Removes all of the target’s stat modifiers.
clear-smog.flavorText: The user attacks the target by throwing a clump of special mud. All stat changes are eliminated.

stored-power.name: stored-power
stored-power.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Power is increased by 100% its original value for every stage any of the user’s stats have been raised.  Accuracy, evasion, and lowered stats do not affect this move’s power.  For a Pokémon with all five stats modified to +6, this move’s power is 31×.
stored-power.shortEffect: Power is higher the more the user’s stats have been raised, to a maximum of 31×.
stored-power.flavorText: The user attacks the target with stored power. The more the user's stats are boosted, the greater the move's power.

quick-guard.name: quick-guard
quick-guard.effect:
Moves with priority greater than 0 will not hit friendly Pokémon for the remainder of this turn.  If the user is last to act this turn, this move will fail.

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
quick-guard.shortEffect: Prevents any priority moves from hitting friendly Pokémon this turn.
quick-guard.flavorText: The user protects itself and its allies from priority moves.

ally-switch.name: ally-switch
ally-switch.effect: User switches position on the field with the friendly Pokémon opposite it.  If the user is in the middle position in a triple battle, or there are no other friendly Pokémon, this move will fail.
ally-switch.shortEffect: User switches places with the friendly Pokémon opposite it.
ally-switch.flavorText: The user teleports using a strange power and switches places with one of its allies. This move's chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

scald.name: scald
scald.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to burn the target.
scald.shortEffect: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.
scald.flavorText: The user attacks by shooting boiling hot water at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

shell-smash.name: shell-smash
shell-smash.effect: Raises the user’s Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by two stages each.  Lowers the user’s Defense and Special Defense by one stage each.
shell-smash.shortEffect: Raises user’s Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by two stages.  Lower user’s Defense and Special Defense by one stage.
shell-smash.flavorText: The user breaks its shell, which lowers its Defense and Sp. Def stats but sharply boosts its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.

heal-pulse.name: heal-pulse
heal-pulse.effect: Heals the target for half its max HP.
heal-pulse.shortEffect: Heals the target for half its max HP.
heal-pulse.flavorText: The user emits a healing pulse that restores the target's HP by up to half its max HP.

hex.name: hex
hex.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target has a major status ailment, this move has double power.
hex.shortEffect: Has double power if the target has a major status ailment.
hex.flavorText: This relentless attack does massive damage to a target affected by status conditions.

sky-drop.name: sky-drop
sky-drop.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  User carries the target high into the air for one turn, during which no moves will hit either Pokémon and neither can act.  On the following turn, the user drops the target, inflicting damage and ending the effect.

If the target is flying-type, this move will function as normal but inflict no damage.

gust, hurricane, sky uppercut, smack down, thunder, twister, and whirlwind can hit both the user and the target during this effect.  gust and twister will additionally have double power.

The damage from hail and sandstorm still applies during this effect.

Either Pokémon may be hit during this effect if also under the effect of lock on, mind reader, or no guard.

This move cannot be used while gravity is in effect.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.

*Bug*: If gravity is used during a double or triple battle while this move is in effect, this move is not correctly canceled on the target, and it remains high in the air indefinitely.  As this move prevents the target from acting, the only way to subsequently remove it from the field is to faint it.
sky-drop.shortEffect: Carries the target high into the air, dodging all attacks against either, and drops it next turn.
sky-drop.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

shift-gear.name: shift-gear
shift-gear.effect: Raises the user’s Attack by one stage and its Speed by two stages.
shift-gear.shortEffect: Raises the user’s Attack by one stage and its Speed by two stages.
shift-gear.flavorText: The user rotates its gears, boosting its Attack stat and sharply boosting its Speed stat.

circle-throw.name: circle-throw
circle-throw.effect:
Inflicts regular damage, then switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon, selected at random.

If the target is under the effect of ingrain or suction cups, or it has a substitute, or its Trainer has no more usable Pokémon, it will not be switched out.  If the target is a wild Pokémon, the battle ends instead.
circle-throw.shortEffect: Ends wild battles.  Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.
circle-throw.flavorText: The target is thrown, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

incinerate.name: incinerate
incinerate.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is holding a berry, it’s destroyed and cannot be used in response to this move.
incinerate.flavorText: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with fire. If a Pokémon is holding a certain item, such as a Berry, the item becomes burned up and unusable.

quash.name: quash
quash.effect: Forces the target to act last this turn, regardless of Speed or move priority.  If the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail.
quash.shortEffect: Makes the target act last this turn.
quash.flavorText: The user suppresses the target and makes its move go last.

acrobatics.name: acrobatics
acrobatics.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If the user has no held item, this move has double power.
acrobatics.shortEffect: Has double power if the user has no held item.
acrobatics.flavorText: The user nimbly strikes the target. This attack does massive damage if the user isn't holding an item.

reflect-type.name: reflect-type
reflect-type.effect: User’s type changes to match the target’s.
reflect-type.flavorText: The user reflects the target's type to become the same type as the target.

retaliate.name: retaliate
retaliate.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If a friendly Pokémon fainted on the previous turn, this move has double power.
retaliate.shortEffect: Has double power if a friendly Pokémon fainted last turn.
retaliate.flavorText: The user takes revenge for a fainted ally. This move's power is boosted if an ally fainted in the previous turn.

final-gambit.name: final-gambit
final-gambit.effect: Inflicts damage equal to the user’s remaining HP.  User faints.
final-gambit.shortEffect: Inflicts damage equal to the user’s remaining HP.  User faints.
final-gambit.flavorText: The user risks everything to attack the target. The user faints but inflicts damage equal to its own HP.

bestow.name: bestow
bestow.effect: Transfers the user’s held item to the target.  If the user has no held item, or the target already has a held item, this move will fail.
bestow.shortEffect: Gives the user’s held item to the target.
bestow.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

inferno.name: inferno
inferno.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 100% chance to burn the target.
inferno.shortEffect: Has a 100% chance to burn the target.
inferno.flavorText: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense fire. This leaves the target with a burn.

water-pledge.name: water-pledge
water-pledge.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If a friendly Pokémon used grass pledge earlier this turn, all opposing Pokémon have halved Speed for four turns (including this one).
water-pledge.shortEffect: With Grass Pledge, halves opposing Pokémon’s Speed for four turns.
water-pledge.flavorText: A column of water hits the target. When used with its fire counterpart, this move's power is boosted and a rainbow appears.

fire-pledge.name: fire-pledge
fire-pledge.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If a friendly Pokémon used water pledge earlier this turn, moves used by any friendly Pokémon have doubled effect chance for four turns (including this one).
fire-pledge.shortEffect: With Water Pledge, doubles the effect chance of friendly Pokémon’s moves for four turns.
fire-pledge.flavorText: A column of fire hits the target. When used with its grass counterpart, this move's power is boosted and a vast sea of fire appears.

grass-pledge.name: grass-pledge
grass-pledge.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If a friendly Pokémon used fire pledge earlier this turn, all opposing Pokémon will take 1/8 their max HP in damage at the end of every turn for four turns (including this one).
grass-pledge.shortEffect: With Fire Pledge, damages opposing Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP every turn for four turns.
grass-pledge.flavorText: A column of grass hits the target. When used with its water counterpart, this move's power is boosted and a vast swamp appears.

volt-switch.name: volt-switch
volt-switch.effect:
Inflicts regular damage, then the user immediately switches out, and the trainer selects a replacement Pokémon from the party.  If the target faints from this attack, the user’s trainer selects the new Pokémon to send out first.  If the user is the last Pokémon in its party that can battle, it will not switch out.

The user may be hit by pursuit when it switches out, if it has been targeted and pursuit has not yet been used.

This move may be used even if the user is under the effect of ingrain.  ingrain’s effect will end.
volt-switch.shortEffect: User must switch out after attacking.
volt-switch.flavorText: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

struggle-bug.name: struggle-bug
struggle-bug.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.
struggle-bug.shortEffect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.
struggle-bug.flavorText: The user attacks by struggling against opposing Pokémon. This also lowers their Sp. Atk stats.

bulldoze.name: bulldoze
bulldoze.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.
bulldoze.shortEffect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.
bulldoze.flavorText: The user strikes everything around it by stomping down on the ground. This lowers the Speed stats of those hit.

frost-breath.name: frost-breath
frost-breath.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Always scores a critical hit.
frost-breath.flavorText: The user attacks by blowing its cold breath on the target. This move always lands a critical hit.

dragon-tail.name: dragon-tail
dragon-tail.effect:
Inflicts regular damage, then switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon, selected at random.

If the target is under the effect of ingrain or suction cups, or it has a substitute, or its Trainer has no more usable Pokémon, it will not be switched out.  If the target is a wild Pokémon, the battle ends instead.
dragon-tail.shortEffect: Ends wild battles.  Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.
dragon-tail.flavorText: The target is knocked away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

work-up.name: work-up
work-up.effect: Raises the user’s Attack and Special Attack by one stage each.
work-up.shortEffect: Raises the user’s Attack and Special Attack by one stage each.
work-up.flavorText: The user is roused, and its Attack and Sp. Atk stats are boosted.

electroweb.name: electroweb
electroweb.effect: Lowers the target’s Speed by one stage.
electroweb.shortEffect: Lowers the target’s Speed by one stage.
electroweb.flavorText: The user captures opposing Pokémon in an electric net to inflict damage. This also lowers their Speed stats.

wild-charge.name: wild-charge
wild-charge.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
wild-charge.shortEffect: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
wild-charge.flavorText: The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes into its target. This also damages the user a little.

drill-run.name: drill-run
drill-run.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
drill-run.shortEffect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.
drill-run.flavorText: The user crashes into the target while rotating its body like a drill. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

dual-chop.name: dual-chop
dual-chop.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Hits twice in one turn.
dual-chop.flavorText:
The user attacks its target by hitting it with brutal
strikes. The target is hit twice in a row.

heart-stamp.name: heart-stamp
heart-stamp.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
heart-stamp.shortEffect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
heart-stamp.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

horn-leech.name: horn-leech
horn-leech.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
horn-leech.shortEffect: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
horn-leech.flavorText: The user drains the target's energy with its horns. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

sacred-sword.name: sacred-sword
sacred-sword.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Damage calculation ignores the target’s stat modifiers, including evasion.
sacred-sword.flavorText: The user attacks by slicing with a sword. The target's stat changes don't affect the damage inflicted by this move.

razor-shell.name: razor-shell
razor-shell.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.
razor-shell.shortEffect: Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.
razor-shell.flavorText: The user cuts the target with sharp shells to inflict damage. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

heat-crash.name: heat-crash
heat-crash.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  The greater the user’s weight compared to the target’s, the higher power this move has, to a maximum of 120.

User’s weight                    | Power
-------------------------------- | ----:
Up to 2× the target’s weight     |    40
Up to 3× the target’s weight     |    60
Up to 4× the target’s weight     |    80
Up to 5× the target’s weight     |   100
More than 5× the target’s weight |   120
heat-crash.shortEffect: Power is higher when the user weighs more than the target, up to a maximum of 120.
heat-crash.flavorText: The user slams into the target with its flame-covered body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater the move's power.

leaf-tornado.name: leaf-tornado
leaf-tornado.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.
leaf-tornado.shortEffect: Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.
leaf-tornado.flavorText:
The user attacks its target by encircling it in sharp
leaves. This attack may also lower the
target’s accuracy.

steamroller.name: steamroller
steamroller.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

Power is doubled against Pokémon that have used minimize since entering the field.
steamroller.shortEffect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
steamroller.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

cotton-guard.name: cotton-guard
cotton-guard.effect: Raises the user’s Defense by three stages.
cotton-guard.shortEffect: Raises the user’s Defense by three stages.
cotton-guard.flavorText: The user protects itself by wrapping its body in soft cotton, drastically boosting its Defense stat.

night-daze.name: night-daze
night-daze.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 40% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.
night-daze.shortEffect: Has a 40% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.
night-daze.flavorText: The user looses a pitch-black shock wave at the target to inflict damage. This may also lower the target's accuracy.

psystrike.name: psystrike
psystrike.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Damage calculation always uses the target’s Defense, regardless of this move’s damage class.
psystrike.shortEffect: Inflicts damage based on the target’s Defense, not Special Defense.
psystrike.flavorText: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This move deals physical damage.

tail-slap.name: tail-slap
tail-slap.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.
tail-slap.flavorText: The user attacks by striking the target with its hard tail. This move hits two to five times in a row.

hurricane.name: hurricane
hurricane.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to confuse the target.

This move can hit Pokémon under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop.

During rain dance, this move has 100% accuracy.  During sunny day, this move has 50% accuracy.
hurricane.shortEffect: Has a 30% chance to confuse the target.
hurricane.flavorText: The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a fierce wind. This may also confuse the target.

head-charge.name: head-charge
head-charge.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
head-charge.shortEffect: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
head-charge.flavorText:
The user charges its head into its target, using its
powerful guard hair. This also damages the user
a little.

gear-grind.name: gear-grind
gear-grind.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Hits twice in one turn.
gear-grind.flavorText:
The user attacks by throwing steel gears at its
target twice.

searing-shot.name: searing-shot
searing-shot.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to burn the target.
searing-shot.shortEffect: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.
searing-shot.flavorText:
The user torches everything around it in an inferno
of scarlet flames. This may also leave those it hits
with a burn.

techno-blast.name: techno-blast
techno-blast.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the user is holding a plate or a drive, this move’s type is the type corresponding to that item.

Note: This effect is technically shared by both techno blast and judgment; however, Techno Blast is only affected by drives, and Judgment is only affected by plates.
techno-blast.shortEffect: If the user is holding a appropriate plate or drive, the damage inflicted will match it.
techno-blast.flavorText:
The user fires a beam of light at its target. The
move’s type changes depending on the Drive the
user holds.

relic-song.name: relic-song
relic-song.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to put the target to sleep.
If the user is a meloetta, it will toggle between Aria and Pirouette Forme.
relic-song.shortEffect: Has a 10% chance to put the target to sleep.
relic-song.flavorText: The user sings an ancient song and attacks by appealing to the hearts of the listening opposing Pokémon. This may also induce sleep.

secret-sword.name: secret-sword
secret-sword.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Damage calculation always uses the target’s Defense, regardless of this move’s damage class.
secret-sword.shortEffect: Inflicts damage based on the target’s Defense, not Special Defense.
secret-sword.flavorText: The user cuts with its long horn. The odd power contained in the horn deals physical damage to the target.

glaciate.name: glaciate
glaciate.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Lowers the target’s Speed by one stage.
glaciate.shortEffect: Lowers the target’s Speed by one stage.
glaciate.flavorText: The user attacks by blowing freezing cold air at opposing Pokémon. This also lowers their Speed stats.

bolt-strike.name: bolt-strike
bolt-strike.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 20% chance to paralyze the target.
bolt-strike.shortEffect: Has a 20% chance to paralyze the target.
bolt-strike.flavorText: The user surrounds itself with a great amount of electricity and charges the target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

blue-flare.name: blue-flare
blue-flare.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 20% chance to burn the target.
blue-flare.shortEffect: Has a 20% chance to burn the target.
blue-flare.flavorText: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense, yet beautiful, blue flame. This may also leave the target with a burn.

fiery-dance.name: fiery-dance
fiery-dance.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 50% chance to raise the user’s Special Attack by one stage.
fiery-dance.shortEffect: Has a 50% chance to raise the user’s Special Attack by one stage.
fiery-dance.flavorText: Cloaked in flames, the user attacks the target by dancing and flapping its wings. This may also boost the user's Sp. Atk stat.

freeze-shock.name: freeze-shock
freeze-shock.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.  User charges for one turn before attacking.
freeze-shock.shortEffect: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.  Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
freeze-shock.flavorText: The turn after using this move, the user hits the target with electrically charged ice to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

ice-burn.name: ice-burn
ice-burn.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to burn the target.  User charges for one turn before attacking.
ice-burn.shortEffect: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.  Has a 30% chance to burn the target.
ice-burn.flavorText: The turn after using this move, the user surrounds the target with an ultracold, freezing wind to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with a burn.

snarl.name: snarl
snarl.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.
snarl.shortEffect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.
snarl.flavorText: The user yells as if it's ranting about something, which lowers the Sp. Atk stats of opposing Pokémon.

icicle-crash.name: icicle-crash
icicle-crash.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
icicle-crash.shortEffect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
icicle-crash.flavorText: The user attacks by crashing large icicles onto the target. This may also make the target flinch.

v-create.name: v-create
v-create.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Lowers the user’s Defense, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.
v-create.shortEffect: Lowers the user’s Defense, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.
v-create.flavorText:
With a hot flame on its forehead, the user hurls itself
at its target. This lowers the user’s Defense, Sp. Def,
and Speed stats.

fusion-flare.name: fusion-flare
fusion-flare.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If a friendly Pokémon used fusion bolt earlier this turn, this move has double power.
fusion-flare.shortEffect: With Fusion Bolt, inflicts double damage.
fusion-flare.flavorText: The user brings down a giant flame. This move's power is boosted when influenced by an enormous lightning bolt.

fusion-bolt.name: fusion-bolt
fusion-bolt.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If a friendly Pokémon used fusion flare earlier this turn, this move has double power.
fusion-bolt.shortEffect: With Fusion Flare, inflicts double damage.
fusion-bolt.flavorText: The user throws down a giant lightning bolt. This move's power is boosted when influenced by an enormous flame.

flying-press.name: flying-press
flying-press.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  For the purposes of type effectiveness, this move is both fighting- and flying-type: its final effectiveness is determined by multiplying the effectiveness of each type against each of the target’s types.

For all other purposes, this move is pure Fighting-type.  If this move’s type is changed, its Fighting typing is overwritten, and its secondary type remains Flying.

If the target has used minimize since entering battle, this move has double power and will never miss.
flying-press.shortEffect: Deals both fighting and flying-type damage.
flying-press.flavorText: The user dives down onto the target from the sky. This move is Fighting and Flying type simultaneously.

mat-block.name: mat-block
mat-block.effect: Protects all friendly Pokémon from damaging moves.  Only works on the first turn after the user is sent out.
mat-block.shortEffect: Protects all friendly Pokémon from damaging moves.  Only works on the first turn after the user is sent out.
mat-block.flavorText:
Using a pulled-up mat as a shield, the user protects
itself and its allies from damaging moves. This does
not stop status moves.

belch.name: belch
belch.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Can only be used if the user has eaten a berry since the beginning of the battle.

After the user eats a berry, it may use this move any number of times until the end of the battle, even if it switches out.  Eating a held berry, eating a berry via bug bite or pluck, or being the target of a Flung berry will enable this move.  Feeding a Pokémon a berry from the bag or using natural gift will not.

If the trainer chooses this move when it cannot be used, the choice is rejected outright and the trainer must choose another move.
belch.shortEffect: Can only be used after the user has eaten a berry.
belch.flavorText: The user lets out a damaging belch at the target. The user must eat a held Berry to use this move.

rototiller.name: rototiller
rototiller.effect: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all grass Pokémon in battle.
rototiller.shortEffect: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all grass Pokémon in battle.
rototiller.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

sticky-web.name: sticky-web
sticky-web.effect:
Shoots a web over the opponents’ side of the field, which lowers the Speed of any opposing Pokémon that enters the field by one stage.

Pokémon in the air, such as flying-types and those with levitate, are unaffected.  rapid spin removes Sticky Web from the user’s side of the field; defog removes it from both sides.
sticky-web.shortEffect: Covers the opposing field, lowering opponents’ Speed by one stage upon switching in.
sticky-web.flavorText: The user weaves a sticky net around the opposing team, which lowers their Speed stats upon switching into battle.

fell-stinger.name: fell-stinger
fell-stinger.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Raises the user’s Attack by two stages if it KOs the target.
fell-stinger.shortEffect: Raises the user’s Attack by two stages if it KOs the target.
fell-stinger.flavorText: When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user's Attack stat is boosted drastically.

phantom-force.name: phantom-force
phantom-force.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  User vanishes for one turn, becoming immune to attack, and hits on the second turn.

This move ignores the effects of detect and protect.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
phantom-force.shortEffect: User vanishes, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.  Hits through Protect and Detect.
phantom-force.flavorText: The user vanishes somewhere, then strikes the target on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

trick-or-treat.name: trick-or-treat
trick-or-treat.effect: Adds ghost to the target’s types.
trick-or-treat.shortEffect: Adds ghost to the target’s types.
trick-or-treat.flavorText:
The user takes the target trick-or-treating.
This adds Ghost type to the target’s type.

noble-roar.name: noble-roar
noble-roar.effect: Lowers the target’s Attack and Special Attack by one stage.
noble-roar.shortEffect: Lowers the target’s Attack and Special Attack by one stage.
noble-roar.flavorText: Letting out a noble roar, the user intimidates the target and lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

ion-deluge.name: ion-deluge
ion-deluge.effect: Changes all Pokémon’s normal moves to electric moves for the rest of the turn.
ion-deluge.shortEffect: Changes all normal moves to electric moves for the rest of the turn.
ion-deluge.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

parabolic-charge.name: parabolic-charge
parabolic-charge.effect: Heals the user for half the total damage dealt to all targets.
parabolic-charge.shortEffect: Heals the user for half the total damage dealt to all targets.
parabolic-charge.flavorText: The user attacks everything around it. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by those hit.

forests-curse.name: forests-curse
forests-curse.effect: Adds grass to the target’s types.
forests-curse.shortEffect: Adds grass to the target’s types.
forests-curse.flavorText: The user puts a forest curse on the target. This adds Grass type to the target's type.

petal-blizzard.name: petal-blizzard
petal-blizzard.flavorText: The user stirs up a violent petal blizzard and damages everything around it.

freeze-dry.name: freeze-dry
freeze-dry.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  This move is super-effective against the water type.

The target’s other type will affect damage as usual.  If this move’s type is changed, it remains super-effective against Water regardless of its type.
freeze-dry.flavorText: The user rapidly cools the target. This may also leave the target frozen. This move is super effective on Water types.

disarming-voice.name: disarming-voice
disarming-voice.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion.
disarming-voice.flavorText: Letting out a charming cry, the user does emotional damage to opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.

parting-shot.name: parting-shot
parting-shot.effect: Lowers all targets’ Attack and Special Attack by one stage.  Makes the user switch out.
parting-shot.shortEffect: Lowers all targets’ Attack and Special Attack by one stage.  Makes the user switch out.
parting-shot.flavorText: With a parting threat, the user lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats. Then it switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

topsy-turvy.name: topsy-turvy
topsy-turvy.flavorText: All stat changes affecting the target turn topsy-turvy and become the opposite of what they were.

draining-kiss.name: draining-kiss
draining-kiss.effect: Deals regular damage.  Drains 75% of the damage inflicted to heal the user.
draining-kiss.shortEffect: Drains 75% of the damage inflicted to heal the user.
draining-kiss.flavorText: The user steals the target's HP with a kiss. The user's HP is restored by over half the damage taken by the target.

crafty-shield.name: crafty-shield
crafty-shield.effect:
Protects all friendly Pokémon from non-damaging moves for the rest of the turn.

Unlike other blocking moves, this move may be used consecutively without its chance of success falling.
crafty-shield.shortEffect: Protects all friendly Pokémon from non-damaging moves.
crafty-shield.flavorText:
The user protects itself and its allies from status
moves with a mysterious power. This does not stop
moves that do damage.

flower-shield.name: flower-shield
flower-shield.effect: Raises the Defense of all grass Pokémon in battle.
flower-shield.shortEffect: Raises the Defense of all grass Pokémon in battle.
flower-shield.flavorText:
The user raises the Defense stats of all Grass-type
Pokémon in battle with a mysterious power.

grassy-terrain.name: grassy-terrain
grassy-terrain.effect:
For five turns, heals all Pokémon on the ground for 1/16 their max HP each turn and strengthens their grass moves to 1.5× their power.

Changes nature power to energy ball.
grassy-terrain.shortEffect: For five turns, heals all Pokémon on the ground for 1/16 max HP each turn and strengthens their grass moves to 1.5× their power.
grassy-terrain.flavorText: The user turns the ground into Grassy Terrain for five turns. This restores the HP of Pokémon on the ground a little every turn and powers up Grass-type moves.

misty-terrain.name: misty-terrain
misty-terrain.effect:
For five turns, protects all Pokémon on the ground from major status ailments and confusion and weakens dragon moves used against them to 0.5× their power.

Changes nature power to moonblast.
misty-terrain.shortEffect: For five turns, protects all Pokémon on the ground from major status ailments and confusion, and halves the power of incoming dragon moves.
misty-terrain.flavorText: This protects Pokémon on the ground from status conditions and halves damage from Dragon-type moves for five turns.

electrify.name: electrify
electrify.effect: Changes the target’s move’s type to electric if it hasn’t moved yet this turn.
electrify.shortEffect: Changes the target’s move’s type to electric if it hasn’t moved yet this turn.
electrify.flavorText:
If the target is electrified before it uses a move
during that turn, the target’s move becomes
Electric type.

play-rough.name: play-rough
play-rough.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Attack by one stage.
play-rough.shortEffect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Attack by one stage.
play-rough.flavorText: The user attacks by playing rough with the target. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.

fairy-wind.name: fairy-wind
fairy-wind.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
fairy-wind.flavorText: The user attacks by stirring up a fairy wind to strike the target.

moonblast.name: moonblast
moonblast.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.
moonblast.shortEffect: Has a 30% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.
moonblast.flavorText: Borrowing the power of the moon, the user attacks the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Atk stat.

boomburst.name: boomburst
boomburst.flavorText: The user attacks everything around it with the destructive power of a terrible explosive sound.

fairy-lock.name: fairy-lock
fairy-lock.effect: Prevents all Pokémon from fleeing or switching out during the next turn.
fairy-lock.shortEffect: Prevents all Pokémon from fleeing or switching out during the next turn.
