fairy-lock.flavorText: By locking down the battlefield, the user keeps all Pokémon from fleeing during the next turn.

kings-shield.name: kings-shield
kings-shield.effect: Blocks damaging attacks and lowers attacking Pokémon’s Attack by two stages on contact.  Switches Aegislash to Shield Forme.
kings-shield.shortEffect: Blocks damaging attacks and lowers attacking Pokémon’s Attack by two stages on contact.  Switches Aegislash to Shield Forme.
kings-shield.flavorText:
The user takes a defensive stance while it protects
itself from damage. It also lowers the Attack stat of any
attacker that makes direct contact.

play-nice.name: play-nice
play-nice.effect: Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.
play-nice.shortEffect: Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.
play-nice.flavorText: The user and the target become friends, and the target loses its will to fight. This lowers the target's Attack stat.

confide.name: confide
confide.effect: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by one stage.
confide.shortEffect: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by one stage.
confide.flavorText: The user tells the target a secret, and the target loses its ability to concentrate. This lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

diamond-storm.name: diamond-storm
diamond-storm.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 50% chance to raise the user’s Defense by two stages for each target hit.
diamond-storm.shortEffect: Has a 50% chance to raise the user’s Defense by two stages for each target hit.
diamond-storm.flavorText: The user whips up a storm of diamonds to damage opposing Pokémon. This may also sharply boost the user's Defense stat.

steam-eruption.name: steam-eruption
steam-eruption.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to burn the target.
steam-eruption.shortEffect: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.
steam-eruption.flavorText: The user immerses the target in superheated steam. This may also leave the target with a burn.

hyperspace-hole.name: hyperspace-hole
hyperspace-hole.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Bypasses and removes any protection effect on the target.
hyperspace-hole.flavorText: Using a hyperspace hole, the user appears right next to the target and strikes. This attack can hit a target using a move such as Protect or Detect.

water-shuriken.name: water-shuriken
water-shuriken.flavorText: The user hits the target with throwing stars two to five times in a row. This move always goes first.

mystical-fire.name: mystical-fire
mystical-fire.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.
mystical-fire.shortEffect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.
mystical-fire.flavorText: The user attacks by breathing a special, hot fire. This also lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

spiky-shield.name: spiky-shield
spiky-shield.effect: Blocks damaging attacks and damages attacking Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP.
spiky-shield.shortEffect: Blocks damaging attacks and damages attacking Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP.
spiky-shield.flavorText: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also damages any attacker that makes direct contact.

aromatic-mist.name: aromatic-mist
aromatic-mist.effect: Raises a selected ally’s Special Defense by one stage.
aromatic-mist.shortEffect: Raises a selected ally’s Special Defense by one stage.
aromatic-mist.flavorText: The user boosts the Sp. Def stat of an ally Pokémon by using a mysterious aroma.

eerie-impulse.name: eerie-impulse
eerie-impulse.effect: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages.
eerie-impulse.shortEffect: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages.
eerie-impulse.flavorText: The user's body generates an eerie impulse. Exposing the target to it harshly lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

venom-drench.name: venom-drench
venom-drench.effect: Lowers the target’s Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by one stage if it is poisoned.
venom-drench.shortEffect: Lowers the target’s Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by one stage if it is poisoned.
venom-drench.flavorText:
Opposing Pokémon are drenched in an odd
poisonous liquid. This lowers the Attack, Sp. Atk, and
Speed stats of a poisoned target.

powder.name: powder
powder.effect: Explodes if the target uses a fire move this turn, damaging it for 1/4 its max HP and preventing the move.
powder.shortEffect: Explodes if the target uses a fire move this turn, damaging it for 1/4 its max HP and preventing the move.
powder.flavorText:
The user covers the target in a combustible powder.
If the target uses a Fire-type move, the powder
explodes and damages the target.

geomancy.name: geomancy
geomancy.effect: Takes one turn to charge, then raises the user’s Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by two stages.
geomancy.shortEffect: Takes one turn to charge, then raises the user’s Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by two stages.
geomancy.flavorText:
The user absorbs energy and sharply raises its
Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats on the next turn.

magnetic-flux.name: magnetic-flux
magnetic-flux.effect: Raises the Defense and Special Defense of all friendly Pokémon with plus or minus by one stage.
magnetic-flux.shortEffect: Raises the Defense and Special Defense of all friendly Pokémon with plus or minus by one stage.
magnetic-flux.flavorText: The user manipulates magnetic fields, which boosts the Defense and Sp. Def stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus Ability or the Minus Ability.

happy-hour.name: happy-hour
happy-hour.effect:
Doubles prize money.

Stacks with a held item.  Only works once per battle.
happy-hour.flavorText:
Using Happy Hour doubles the amount of prize
money received after battle.

electric-terrain.name: electric-terrain
electric-terrain.effect:
For five turns, prevents all Pokémon on the ground from sleeping and strengthens their electric moves to 1.5× their power.

Changes nature power to thunderbolt.
electric-terrain.shortEffect: For five turns, prevents all Pokémon on the ground from sleeping and strengthens their electric moves to 1.5× their power.
electric-terrain.flavorText: The user turns the ground into Electric Terrain for five turns, powering up Electric-type moves. Pokémon on the ground can no longer fall asleep.

dazzling-gleam.name: dazzling-gleam
dazzling-gleam.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
dazzling-gleam.flavorText: The user damages opposing Pokémon by emitting a powerful flash.

celebrate.name: celebrate
celebrate.flavorText: The Pokémon congratulates you on your special day!

hold-hands.name: hold-hands
hold-hands.flavorText:
The user and an ally hold hands. This makes them
very happy.

baby-doll-eyes.name: baby-doll-eyes
baby-doll-eyes.effect: Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.
baby-doll-eyes.shortEffect: Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.
baby-doll-eyes.flavorText: The user stares at the target with its baby-doll eyes, which lowers the target's Attack stat. This move always goes first.

nuzzle.name: nuzzle
nuzzle.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.
nuzzle.shortEffect: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.
nuzzle.flavorText: The user attacks by nuzzling its electrified cheeks against the target. This also leaves the target with paralysis.

hold-back.name: hold-back
hold-back.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Will not reduce the target’s HP below 1.
hold-back.shortEffect: Cannot lower the target’s HP below 1.
hold-back.flavorText:
The user holds back when it attacks, and the target
is left with at least 1 HP.

infestation.name: infestation
infestation.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  For the next 2–5 turns, the target cannot leave the field and is damaged for 1/16 its max HP at the end of each turn.  The user continues to use other moves during this time.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

rapid spin cancels this effect.
infestation.shortEffect: Prevents the target from fleeing and inflicts damage for 2-5 turns.
infestation.flavorText: The target is infested and attacked for four to five turns. The target can't flee during this time.

power-up-punch.name: power-up-punch
power-up-punch.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Raises the user’s Attack by one stage.
power-up-punch.shortEffect: Raises the user’s Attack by one stage after inflicting damage.
power-up-punch.flavorText:
Striking opponents over and over makes the user’s
fists harder. Hitting a target raises the Attack stat.

oblivion-wing.name: oblivion-wing
oblivion-wing.effect: Deals regular damage.  Drains 75% of the damage inflicted to heal the user.
oblivion-wing.shortEffect: Drains 75% of the damage inflicted to heal the user.
oblivion-wing.flavorText:
The user absorbs its target’s HP. The user’s HP is
restored by over half of the damage taken by
the target.

thousand-arrows.name: thousand-arrows
thousand-arrows.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Grounds the target until it leaves battle.  Ignores levitation effects and the immunity of flying-type Pokémon.
thousand-arrows.shortEffect: Grounds the target, and hits even Flying-type or levitating Pokémon.
thousand-arrows.flavorText:
This move also hits opposing Pokémon that are in
the air. Those Pokémon are knocked down to
the ground.

thousand-waves.name: thousand-waves
thousand-waves.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Traps the target.
thousand-waves.shortEffect: Prevents the target from leaving battle.
thousand-waves.flavorText:
The user attacks with a wave that crawls along
the ground. Those it hits can’t flee from battle.

lands-wrath.name: lands-wrath
lands-wrath.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
lands-wrath.flavorText:
The user gathers the energy of the land and focuses
that power on opposing Pokémon to damage them.

light-of-ruin.name: light-of-ruin
light-of-ruin.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/2 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
light-of-ruin.shortEffect: User receives 1/2 the damage inflicted in recoil.
light-of-ruin.flavorText:
Drawing power from the Eternal Flower, the user
fires a powerful beam of light. This also damages the
user quite a lot.

origin-pulse.name: origin-pulse
origin-pulse.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
origin-pulse.flavorText: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with countless beams of light that glow a deep and brilliant blue.

precipice-blades.name: precipice-blades
precipice-blades.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
precipice-blades.flavorText: The user attacks opposing Pokémon by manifesting the power of the land in fearsome blades of stone.

dragon-ascent.name: dragon-ascent
dragon-ascent.effect: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Defense and Special Defense by one stage each.
dragon-ascent.shortEffect: Lowers the user’s Defense and Special Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.
dragon-ascent.flavorText: The user attacks the target by dropping out of the sky at high speed. This also lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def stats.

hyperspace-fury.name: hyperspace-fury
hyperspace-fury.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Bypasses and removes any protection effect on the target.
hyperspace-fury.flavorText: Using its many arms, the user unleashes a barrage of attacks that ignore the effects of moves like Protect and Detect. This also lowers the user's Defense stat.

breakneck-blitz--physical.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
breakneck-blitz--physical.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.

shore-up.name: shore-up
shore-up.effect: Heals the user for ½ its max HP.  During a sandstorm, the healing is increased to ⅔.
shore-up.shortEffect: Heals the user for ½ its max HP, or ⅔ during a sandstorm.
shore-up.flavorText: The user restores its own HP by up to half its max HP. It regains more HP in a sandstorm.

first-impression.name: first-impression
first-impression.effect: Inflicts regular damage. Can only be used on the user’s first turn after entering the field.
first-impression.shortEffect: Can only be used as the first move after the user enters battle.
first-impression.flavorText: Although this move has great power, it works only on the first turn each time the user enters battle.

baneful-bunker.name: baneful-bunker
baneful-bunker.effect: Grants the user protection for the rest of the turn.  If a Pokémon attempts to use a move that makes contact with the user, that Pokémon will be poisoned.  This move’s chance of success halves every time it’s used consecutively with any other protection move.
baneful-bunker.shortEffect: Grants the user protection for the rest of the turn and poisons any Pokémon that tries to use a contact move on it.
baneful-bunker.flavorText: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also poisons any attacker that makes direct contact.

spirit-shackle.name: spirit-shackle
spirit-shackle.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Traps the target.
spirit-shackle.flavorText: The user attacks while simultaneously stitching the target's shadow to the ground to prevent the target from fleeing.

darkest-lariat.name: darkest-lariat
darkest-lariat.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Damage calculation ignores the target’s stat modifiers, including evasion.
darkest-lariat.flavorText: The user swings both arms and hits the target. The target's stat changes don't affect the damage inflicted by this move.

sparkling-aria.name: sparkling-aria
sparkling-aria.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target has a burn and takes damage from this move, its burn is healed.
sparkling-aria.flavorText: The user bursts into song, emitting many bubbles. Any Pokémon suffering from a burn will be cured by the touch of these bubbles.

ice-hammer.name: ice-hammer
ice-hammer.effect: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Speed by one stage.
ice-hammer.shortEffect: Lowers user’s Speed by one stage.
ice-hammer.flavorText: The user swings its strong, heavy fist at the target to inflict damage. This also lowers the user's Speed stat.

floral-healing.name: floral-healing
floral-healing.effect: Heals the target for ½ its max HP.  If grassy terrain is in effect, heals for ⅔ instead.
floral-healing.shortEffect: Heals the target for ½ its max HP, or ⅔ on Grassy Terrain.
floral-healing.flavorText: The user restores the target's HP by up to half its max HP. More HP is restored when the ground is Grassy Terrain.

high-horsepower.name: high-horsepower
high-horsepower.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
high-horsepower.flavorText: The user fiercely attacks the target using its entire body.

strength-sap.name: strength-sap
strength-sap.effect:
Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.  Heals the user by the target’s current Attack, including modifiers, but not including this move’s Attack-lowering effect.

If the target’s Attack is already at -6, this move will fail.  In any other situation that would prevent a stat modification, the healing will still succeed.
strength-sap.shortEffect: Heals the user by the target’s current Attack stat and lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.
strength-sap.flavorText: The user restores its own HP by the same amount as the target's Attack stat. It then lowers the target's Attack stat.

solar-blade.name: solar-blade
solar-blade.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  User charges for one turn before attacking.

During sunny day, the charge turn is skipped.

During hail, rain dance, or sandstorm, power is halved.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
solar-blade.shortEffect: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.
solar-blade.flavorText: The user gathers light on the first turn, then fills a blade with the light's energy and attacks on the next turn.

leafage.name: leafage
leafage.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
leafage.flavorText: The user attacks by pelting the target with leaves.

spotlight.name: spotlight
spotlight.effect: For the duration of the turn, if the target is also a valid target for a move used by one of its opponents, that move will target it instead.
spotlight.shortEffect: Forces the target’s opponents to aim at the target for the rest of the turn.
spotlight.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

toxic-thread.name: toxic-thread
toxic-thread.effect: Poisons the target and lowers its Speed by one stage.
toxic-thread.shortEffect: Poisons the target and lowers its Speed by one stage.
toxic-thread.flavorText: The user shoots poisonous threads to poison the target and lower the target's Speed stat.

laser-focus.name: laser-focus
laser-focus.effect: The user’s next move will result in a critical hit.
laser-focus.shortEffect: Guarantees a critical hit with the user’s next move.
laser-focus.flavorText:
The user concentrates intensely. The attack on the
next turn always results in a critical hit.

gear-up.name: gear-up
gear-up.effect: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all friendly Pokémon with plus or minus by one stage.
gear-up.shortEffect: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all friendly Pokémon with plus or minus by one stage.
gear-up.flavorText:
The user engages its gears to raise the Attack and
Sp. Atk stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or
Minus Ability.

throat-chop.name: throat-chop
throat-chop.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Silences the target for two turns, preventing it from using any sound-based moves.
throat-chop.shortEffect: Prevents the target from using sound-based moves for two turns.
throat-chop.flavorText: The user attacks the target's throat, and the resultant suffering prevents the target from using sound-based moves for two turns.

pollen-puff.name: pollen-puff
pollen-puff.effect: If the target is an opponent, inflicts regular damage.  If the target is an ally, heals the target for 50% of its max HP.
pollen-puff.shortEffect: Damages opponents, but heals allies for 50% of their max HP.
pollen-puff.flavorText: The user attacks the enemy with a pollen puff that explodes. If the target is an ally, it gives the ally a pollen puff that restores its HP instead.

anchor-shot.name: anchor-shot
anchor-shot.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Traps the target.
anchor-shot.flavorText:
The user entangles the target with its anchor chain
while attacking. The target becomes unable to flee.

psychic-terrain.name: psychic-terrain
psychic-terrain.effect:
Changes the terrain to Psychic Terrain for 5 turns.  Overrides electric terrain, grassy terrain, and misty terrain.

All Pokémon on the ground are immune to moves with priority greater than 0.  (Moves that target the field rather than individual Pokémon, such as spikes, are not affected.)  Additionally, when a Pokémon on the ground uses a psychic-type move, that move’s power is increased to 1.5×.

If a Pokémon is holding a Terrain Extender when creating Psychic Terrain (by any means), the effect lasts for 8 turns instead of 5.
psychic-terrain.shortEffect: Protects Pokémon on the ground from priority moves and increases the power of their  Psychic moves by 50%.
psychic-terrain.flavorText: This protects Pokémon on the ground from priority moves and powers up Psychic-type moves for five turns.

lunge.name: lunge
lunge.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.
lunge.shortEffect: Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage after inflicting damage.
lunge.flavorText: The user makes a lunge at the target, attacking with full force. This also lowers the target's Attack stat.

fire-lash.name: fire-lash
fire-lash.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Lowers the target’s Defense by one stage.
fire-lash.shortEffect: Lowers the target’s Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.
fire-lash.flavorText: The user strikes the target with a burning lash. This also lowers the target's Defense stat.

power-trip.name: power-trip
power-trip.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Power is increased by 100% its original value for every stage any of the user’s stats have been raised.  Accuracy, evasion, and lowered stats do not affect this move’s power.  For a Pokémon with all five stats modified to +6, this move’s power is 31×.
power-trip.shortEffect: Power is higher the more the user’s stats have been raised, to a maximum of 31×.
power-trip.flavorText: The user boasts its strength and attacks the target. The more the user's stats are boosted, the greater the move's power.

burn-up.name: burn-up
burn-up.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Removes the user’s fire type after damage calculation.  If the user is not fire-type, this move will fail.
burn-up.shortEffect: Removes the user’s fire type after inflicting damage.
burn-up.flavorText:
To inflict massive damage, the user burns itself out.
After using this move, the user will no longer be
Fire type.

speed-swap.name: speed-swap
speed-swap.effect: Exchanges the original Speed stats of the user and target.
speed-swap.shortEffect: Exchanges the user’s Speed with the target’s.
speed-swap.flavorText: The user exchanges Speed stats with the target.

smart-strike.name: smart-strike
smart-strike.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
smart-strike.flavorText: The user stabs the target with a sharp horn. This attack never misses.

purify.name: purify
purify.effect: Cures the target of its major status ailment and heals the user for 50% of its max HP.  If the target has no major status ailment, this move will fail.
purify.shortEffect: Cures the target of a major status ailment and heals the user for 50% of its max HP.
purify.flavorText:
The user heals the target’s status condition. If the
move succeeds, it also restores the user’s own HP.

revelation-dance.name: revelation-dance
revelation-dance.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  This move’s type matches the user’s first type, if any; otherwise, it’s typeless.
revelation-dance.shortEffect: Has the same type as the user.
revelation-dance.flavorText: The user attacks the target by dancing with all its might. This move becomes the same type as the user's type.

core-enforcer.name: core-enforcer
core-enforcer.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target has already moved this turn, its ability is nullified.
core-enforcer.shortEffect: Nullifies the target’s ability if it moves earlier.
core-enforcer.flavorText:
If the Pokémon the user has inflicted damage on
have already used their moves, this move eliminates
the effect of the target’s Ability.

trop-kick.name: trop-kick
trop-kick.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.
trop-kick.shortEffect: Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage after inflicting damage.
trop-kick.flavorText: The user lands an intense kick of tropical origins on the target. This also lowers the target's Attack stat.

instruct.name: instruct
instruct.effect: The target immediately uses its most recently-used move.  This is independent of the target’s normal action for the turn (i.e., it may end up moving twice), but otherwise functions as usual, including deduction of PP.  This effect works for disabled moves and ignores torment.
instruct.shortEffect: Forces the target to repeat its last used move.
instruct.flavorText: The user instructs the target to reuse the move last used by the target.

beak-blast.name: beak-blast
beak-blast.effect: Begins charging at the start of the turn, then attacks as normal.  Any Pokémon that makes contact with the user while charging is burned.  The charging is not affected by accuracy, sleep, paralysis, or any other effect that would interfere with a move.
beak-blast.shortEffect: Inflicts a burn on any Pokémon that makes contact before the attack.
beak-blast.flavorText: The user first heats up its beak, and then it attacks the target. Making direct contact with the user while it's heating up its beak results in a burn.

clanging-scales.name: clanging-scales
clanging-scales.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Lowers the user’s Defense by one stage.
clanging-scales.shortEffect: Lowers the user’s Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.
clanging-scales.flavorText: The user rubs the scales on its entire body and makes a huge noise to attack opposing Pokémon. The user's Defense stat is lowered after the attack.

dragon-hammer.name: dragon-hammer
dragon-hammer.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
dragon-hammer.flavorText: The user wields its body like a hammer to attack the target and inflict damage.

brutal-swing.name: brutal-swing
brutal-swing.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
brutal-swing.flavorText: The user swings its body around violently to inflict damage on everything in its vicinity.

aurora-veil.name: aurora-veil
aurora-veil.effect:
Places the Aurora Veil effect on the user’s side of the field for the next 5 turns.  If the weather is not hail, or the weather is disabled by the effects of cloud nine or air lock, this move will fail.

Any regular damage dealt to an affected Pokémon is reduced by ½.  (If there are multiple Pokémon on the affected field, the reduction is ⅓.)
aurora-veil.shortEffect: Reduces damage five turns, but must be used during hail.
aurora-veil.flavorText: This move reduces damage from physical and special moves for five turns. This can be used only when it is snowing.

sinister-arrow-raid.name: sinister-arrow-raid
sinister-arrow-raid.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
sinister-arrow-raid.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

malicious-moonsault.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
malicious-moonsault.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

oceanic-operetta.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
oceanic-operetta.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

guardian-of-alola.name: guardian-of-alola
guardian-of-alola.effect: Inflicts direct damage equal to ¾ of the target’s remaining HP.
guardian-of-alola.shortEffect: Damages the target for 75% of its remaining HP.
guardian-of-alola.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

soul-stealing-7-star-strike.name: soul-stealing-7-star-strike
soul-stealing-7-star-strike.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
soul-stealing-7-star-strike.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

stoked-sparksurfer.name: stoked-sparksurfer
stoked-sparksurfer.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.
stoked-sparksurfer.shortEffect: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.
stoked-sparksurfer.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

pulverizing-pancake.name: pulverizing-pancake
pulverizing-pancake.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
pulverizing-pancake.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

extreme-evoboost.name: extreme-evoboost
extreme-evoboost.effect: Raises the user’s Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by two stages each.
extreme-evoboost.shortEffect: Raises all of the user’s stats by two stages.
extreme-evoboost.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

genesis-supernova.name: genesis-supernova
genesis-supernova.effect: Inflicts regular damage, then (if successful) changes the terrain to psychic terrain.
genesis-supernova.shortEffect: Changes the terrain to Psychic Terrain after inflicting damage.
genesis-supernova.flavorText:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

shell-trap.name: shell-trap
shell-trap.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If the user was not yet hit by an opponent’s physical move this turn, this move will fail.
shell-trap.shortEffect: Only inflicts damage if the user was hit by a physical move this turn.
shell-trap.flavorText:
The user sets a shell trap. If the user is hit by a
physical move, the trap will explode and inflict
damage on opposing Pokémon.

fleur-cannon.name: fleur-cannon
fleur-cannon.effect: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages.
fleur-cannon.shortEffect: Lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.
fleur-cannon.flavorText: The user unleashes a strong beam. The recoil from this move harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.

psychic-fangs.name: psychic-fangs
psychic-fangs.effect: Destroys any light screen or reflect on the target’s side of the field, then inflicts regular damage.
psychic-fangs.flavorText: The user attacks by biting the target with its psychic capabilities. This move can also break barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.

stomping-tantrum.name: stomping-tantrum
stomping-tantrum.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Power is doubled if the user’s last move failed for any reason (i.e., produced the message "But it failed!") or was ineffective due to types.
stomping-tantrum.shortEffect: Has double power if the user’s last move failed.
stomping-tantrum.flavorText: Driven by frustration, the user attacks the target. This move's power is doubled if the user's previous move failed.

shadow-bone.name: shadow-bone
shadow-bone.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 20% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.
shadow-bone.shortEffect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.
shadow-bone.flavorText:
The user attacks by beating the target with a
bone that contains a spirit. This may also lower
the target’s Defense stat.

accelerock.name: accelerock
accelerock.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
accelerock.flavorText: The user smashes into the target at high speed. This move always goes first.

liquidation.name: liquidation
liquidation.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 20% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.
liquidation.shortEffect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.
liquidation.flavorText: The user slams into the target using a full-force blast of water. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

prismatic-laser.name: prismatic-laser
prismatic-laser.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.
prismatic-laser.shortEffect: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.
prismatic-laser.flavorText: The user shoots powerful lasers using the power of a prism. The user can't move on the next turn.

spectral-thief.name: spectral-thief
spectral-thief.effect: Steals the target’s stat increases, then inflicts regular damage.  Will not steal stat increases that would put any of the user’s stats at more than +6; any excess is left on the target.  Stolen increases are affected by abilities as normal.
spectral-thief.shortEffect: Steals the target’s stat increases, then inflicts damage.
spectral-thief.flavorText:
The user hides in the target’s shadow, steals
the target’s stat boosts, and then attacks.

sunsteel-strike.name: sunsteel-strike
sunsteel-strike.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Other Pokémon’s abilities cannot activate in response to this move.  In particular, it hits through disguise
sunsteel-strike.flavorText: The user slams into the target with the force of a meteor. This move can be used on the target regardless of its Ability.

moongeist-beam.name: moongeist-beam
moongeist-beam.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Other Pokémon’s abilities cannot activate in response to this move.  In particular, it hits through disguise
moongeist-beam.flavorText: The user emits a sinister ray to attack the target. This move can be used on the target regardless of its Ability.

tearful-look.name: tearful-look
tearful-look.effect: Lowers the target’s Attack and Special Attack by one stage each.
tearful-look.shortEffect: Lowers the target’s Attack and Special Attack by one stage.
tearful-look.flavorText: The user gets teary-eyed to make the target lose its combative spirit. This lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

zing-zap.name: zing-zap
zing-zap.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
zing-zap.shortEffect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
zing-zap.flavorText: The user crashes into the target, delivering a powerful electric shock. This may also make the target flinch.

natures-madness.name: natures-madness
natures-madness.effect: Inflicts typeless damage equal to half the target’s remaining HP.
natures-madness.shortEffect: Inflicts damage equal to half the target’s HP.
natures-madness.flavorText:
The user hits the target with the force of nature.
It halves the target’s HP.

multi-attack.name: multi-attack
multi-attack.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the user is holding a plate or a drive, this move’s type is the type corresponding to that item.

Note: This effect is technically shared by both techno blast and judgment; however, Techno Blast is only affected by drives, and Judgment is only affected by plates.
multi-attack.shortEffect: If the user is holding a appropriate plate or drive, the damage inflicted will match it.
multi-attack.flavorText:
Cloaking itself in high energy, the user slams into the
target. The memory held determines the move’s type.

10-000-000-volt-thunderbolt.name: 10-000-000-volt-thunderbolt
10-000-000-volt-thunderbolt.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
10-000-000-volt-thunderbolt.flavorText:

double-iron-bash.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Hits twice in one turn.
double-iron-bash.flavorText:

and then strikes with its arms twice in a row. This may
also make the target flinch.

max-guard.name: max-guard
max-guard.effect:
No moves will hit the user for the remainder of this turn.  If the user is last to act this turn, this move will fail.

If the user successfully used detect, endure, protect, quick guard, or wide guard on the last turn, this move has a 50% chance to fail.

lock on, mind reader, and no guard provide a (100 – accuracy)% chance for moves to break through this move.  This does not apply to one-hit KO moves (fissure, guillotine, horn drill, and sheer cold); those are always blocked by this move.

thunder during rain dance and blizzard during hail have a 30% chance to break through this move.

The following effects are not prevented by this move:

* acupressure from an ally
* curse’s curse effect
* Delayed damage from doom desire and future sight; however, these moves will be prevented if they are used this turn
* feint, which will also end this move’s protection after it hits
* imprison
* perish song
* shadow force
* Moves that merely copy the user, such as transform or psych up

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
max-guard.shortEffect: Prevents any moves from hitting the user this turn.
max-guard.flavorText:
This move enables the user to protect itself from
all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used
in succession.

dynamax-cannon.name: dynamax-cannon
dynamax-cannon.effect: Inflicts regular damage, then (if successful) sets light screen on the user’s side of the field.
dynamax-cannon.shortEffect: Sets Light Screen on the user’s side of the field after inflicting damage.
dynamax-cannon.flavorText: The user condenses energy within its body and unleashes that energy from its core to inflict damage.

snipe-shot.name: snipe-shot
snipe-shot.effect: Inflicts regular damage, then (if successful) sets reflect on the user’s side of the field.
snipe-shot.shortEffect: Sets Reflect on the user’s side of the field after inflicting damage.
snipe-shot.flavorText: The user ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon's moves and Abilities that draw in moves, allowing this move to hit the chosen target.

jaw-lock.name: jaw-lock
jaw-lock.effect: Inflicts regular damage, then (if successful) sets leech seed on the target.
jaw-lock.shortEffect: Seeds the target after inflicting damage.
jaw-lock.flavorText: This move prevents the user and the target from switching out until either of them faints. The effect goes away if either of the Pokémon leaves the field.

stuff-cheeks.name: stuff-cheeks
stuff-cheeks.effect: Inflicts regular damage, then (if successful) removes major status effects from every Pokémon in the user’s party.
stuff-cheeks.shortEffect: Cures the entire party of major status effects after inflicting damage.
stuff-cheeks.flavorText: The user eats its held Berry, then sharply boosts its Defense stat.

no-retreat.name: no-retreat
no-retreat.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Hits twice in one turn, with a 100% chance to make the target flinch.
no-retreat.shortEffect: Hits twice in one turn, with a 100% chance to make the target flinch.
no-retreat.flavorText: This move boosts all the user's stats but prevents the user from switching out or fleeing.

tar-shot.name: tar-shot
tar-shot.flavorText: The user pours sticky tar over the target, lowering the target's Speed stat. The target becomes weaker to Fire-type moves.

magic-powder.name: magic-powder
magic-powder.flavorText: The user scatters a cloud of magic powder that changes the target's type to Psychic.

dragon-darts.name: dragon-darts
dragon-darts.flavorText: The user attacks twice using Dreepy. If there are two opposing Pokémon, this move hits each of them once.

teatime.name: teatime
teatime.flavorText: The user has teatime with all the Pokémon currently in the battle. Each Pokémon eats its held Berry.

octolock.name: octolock
octolock.flavorText:
The user locks the target in and prevents it from
fleeing. This move also lowers the target’s Defense
and Sp. Def every turn.

bolt-beak.name: bolt-beak
bolt-beak.flavorText:
The user stabs the target with its electrified beak.
If the user attacks before the target, the power of this
move is doubled.

fishious-rend.name: fishious-rend
fishious-rend.flavorText:
The user rends the target with its hard gills.
If the user attacks before the target, the power of this
move is doubled.

court-change.name: court-change
court-change.flavorText: With its mysterious power, the user swaps the effects on either side of the field.

max-flare.flavorText:
This is a Fire-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use.
The user intensifies the sun for five turns.

clangorous-soul.flavorText: The user boosts all its stats by using some of its own HP.

body-press.name: body-press
body-press.flavorText: The user attacks by slamming its body into the target. The higher the user's Defense stat, the greater the damage this move deals.

decorate.name: decorate
decorate.flavorText: The user sharply boosts the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats by decorating the target.

drum-beating.name: drum-beating
drum-beating.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.
drum-beating.shortEffect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.
drum-beating.flavorText: The user plays its drum, controlling the drum's roots to attack the target. This also lowers the target's Speed stat.

snap-trap.name: snap-trap
snap-trap.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  For the next 2–5 turns, the target cannot leave the field and is damaged for 1/16 its max HP at the end of each turn.  The user continues to use other moves during this time.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

rapid spin cancels this effect.
snap-trap.shortEffect: Prevents the target from fleeing and inflicts damage for 2-5 turns.
snap-trap.flavorText:
The user snares the target in a snap trap for four to
five turns.

pyro-ball.name: pyro-ball
pyro-ball.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
pyro-ball.shortEffect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
pyro-ball.flavorText: The user attacks by igniting a small stone and launching it as a fiery ball at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

behemoth-blade.name: behemoth-blade
behemoth-blade.flavorText:
The user becomes a gigantic sword and cuts the target.
This move deals twice the damage if the target
is Dynamaxed.

behemoth-bash.name: behemoth-bash
behemoth-bash.flavorText:
The user becomes a gigantic shield and slams into
the target. This move deals twice the damage if the
target is Dynamaxed.

aura-wheel.name: aura-wheel
aura-wheel.flavorText: Morpeko attacks and boosts its Speed stat with the energy stored in its cheeks. This move's type changes depending on the user's form.

breaking-swipe.name: breaking-swipe
breaking-swipe.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.
breaking-swipe.shortEffect: Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage after inflicting damage.
breaking-swipe.flavorText: The user swings its tough tail wildly and attacks opposing Pokémon. This also lowers their Attack stats.

branch-poke.name: branch-poke
branch-poke.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
branch-poke.flavorText: The user attacks the target by poking it with a sharply pointed branch.

overdrive.name: overdrive
overdrive.flavorText: The user attacks opposing Pokémon by twanging a guitar or bass guitar, causing a huge echo and strong vibration.

apple-acid.name: apple-acid
apple-acid.flavorText: The user attacks the target with an acidic liquid created from tart apples. This also lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.

grav-apple.name: grav-apple
grav-apple.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Lowers the target’s Defense by one stage.
grav-apple.shortEffect: Lowers the target’s Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.
grav-apple.flavorText: The user inflicts damage by dropping an apple from high above. This also lowers the target's Defense stat.

spirit-break.name: spirit-break
spirit-break.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.
spirit-break.shortEffect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.
spirit-break.flavorText: The user attacks the target with so much force that it could break the target's spirit. This also lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

strange-steam.name: strange-steam
strange-steam.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.
strange-steam.shortEffect: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.
strange-steam.flavorText: The user attacks the target by emitting steam. This may also confuse the target.

life-dew.name: life-dew
life-dew.flavorText: The user scatters mysterious water around and restores the HP of itself and its ally Pokémon currently in the battle.

obstruct.name: obstruct
obstruct.flavorText:
This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks.
Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
Direct contact harshly lowers the attacker’s Defense stat.

false-surrender.name: false-surrender
false-surrender.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
false-surrender.flavorText: The user pretends to bow its head, but then it stabs the target with its disheveled hair. This attack never misses.

meteor-assault.name: meteor-assault
meteor-assault.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.
meteor-assault.shortEffect: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.
meteor-assault.flavorText:
The user attacks wildly with its thick leek.
The user can’t move on the next turn, because the
force of this move makes it stagger.

eternabeam.name: eternabeam
eternabeam.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.
eternabeam.shortEffect: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.
eternabeam.flavorText:
This is Eternatus’s most powerful attack in its original
form. The user can’t move on the next turn.

steel-beam.name: steel-beam
steel-beam.effect: Inflicts damage, and the user takes damage equal to half of its max HP, rounded up. The user still takes damage if the move is blocked by Protect or Substitute, misses, or if the target has Flash Fire.
steel-beam.shortEffect: Inflicts damage, and the user takes damage equal to half of its max HP, rounded up.
steel-beam.flavorText: The user fires a beam of steel that it collected from its entire body. This also damages the user.

expanding-force.name: expanding-force
expanding-force.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
expanding-force.flavorText: The user attacks the target with its psychic power. When the ground is Psychic Terrain, this move's power is boosted and it damages all opposing Pokémon.

steel-roller.name: steel-roller
steel-roller.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
steel-roller.flavorText: The user attacks while destroying the terrain. This move fails if the ground hasn't turned into a terrain.

scale-shot.name: scale-shot
scale-shot.effect: Inflicts regular damage two to five times in a row, raising the user’s Speed and lowering the user’s Defense by one stage each upon last hit.
scale-shot.shortEffect: Boosts the user’s Speed and lowers their Defense by one stage after inflicting damage two to five times in a row.
scale-shot.flavorText: The user attacks by shooting scales two to five times in a row. This move boosts the user's Speed stat but lowers its Defense stat.

meteor-beam.name: meteor-beam
meteor-beam.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
meteor-beam.flavorText: The user gathers energy from space and boosts its Sp. Atk stat on the first turn, then attacks on the next turn.

shell-side-arm.name: shell-side-arm
shell-side-arm.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
shell-side-arm.flavorText: This move is either physical or special—whichever will inflict more damage. This may also poison the target.

misty-explosion.name: misty-explosion
misty-explosion.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
misty-explosion.flavorText: The user attacks everything around it and faints upon using this move. This move's power is boosted on Misty Terrain.

grassy-glide.name: grassy-glide
grassy-glide.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
grassy-glide.flavorText: Gliding on the ground, the user attacks the target. This move always goes first on Grassy Terrain.

rising-voltage.name: rising-voltage
rising-voltage.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
rising-voltage.flavorText: The user attacks with electricity rising from the ground. This move's power is doubled if the target is on Electric Terrain.

terrain-pulse.name: terrain-pulse
terrain-pulse.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
terrain-pulse.flavorText: The user utilizes the energy of the terrain to attack. This move’s type and power change depending on the terrain at the time the move is used.

skitter-smack.name: skitter-smack
skitter-smack.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
skitter-smack.flavorText: The user skitters behind the target to attack. This also lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

burning-jealousy.name: burning-jealousy
burning-jealousy.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
burning-jealousy.flavorText: The user attacks with energy from jealousy. This leaves all opposing Pokémon that have had their stats boosted during the turn with a burn.

lash-out.name: lash-out
lash-out.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
lash-out.flavorText: The user lashes out to vent its frustration toward the target. This move's power is doubled if the user's stats were lowered during this turn.

poltergeist.name: poltergeist
poltergeist.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
poltergeist.flavorText: The user attacks by controlling the target's item. This move fails if the target isn't holding an item.

corrosive-gas.name: corrosive-gas
corrosive-gas.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
corrosive-gas.flavorText:
The user surrounds everything around it with
highly acidic gas and melts away items they hold.

coaching.name: coaching
coaching.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
coaching.flavorText: The user properly coaches its ally Pokémon, boosting their Attack and Defense stats.

flip-turn.name: flip-turn
flip-turn.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
flip-turn.flavorText: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

triple-axel.name: triple-axel
triple-axel.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
triple-axel.flavorText: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successful hit.

dual-wingbeat.name: dual-wingbeat
dual-wingbeat.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
dual-wingbeat.flavorText: The user slams the target with its wings to inflict damage. The target is hit twice in a row.

scorching-sands.name: scorching-sands
scorching-sands.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to burn the target.
scorching-sands.shortEffect: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.
scorching-sands.flavorText: The user throws scorching sand at the target to attack. This may also leave the target with a burn.

jungle-healing.name: jungle-healing
jungle-healing.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
jungle-healing.flavorText: The user becomes one with the jungle, restoring HP and curing status conditions for itself and its ally Pokémon currently in the battle.

wicked-blow.name: wicked-blow
wicked-blow.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
wicked-blow.flavorText: The user, having mastered the Dark style, strikes the target with a fierce blow. This move always lands a critical hit.

surging-strikes.name: surging-strikes
surging-strikes.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
surging-strikes.flavorText: The user, having mastered the Water style, strikes the target with a flowing motion three times in a row. This move always lands a critical hit.

thunder-cage.name: thunder-cage
thunder-cage.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
thunder-cage.flavorText: The user traps the target inside a cage of sparking electricity that inflicts damage for four to five turns.

dragon-energy.name: dragon-energy
dragon-energy.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
dragon-energy.flavorText: Converting its life-force into power, the user attacks opposing Pokémon. The lower the user's HP, the lower the move's power.

freezing-glare.name: freezing-glare
freezing-glare.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
freezing-glare.flavorText: The user shoots its psychic power from its eyes to attack. This may also leave the target frozen.

fiery-wrath.name: fiery-wrath
fiery-wrath.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
fiery-wrath.flavorText: The user transforms its wrath into a fire-like aura to attack. This may also make opposing Pokémon flinch.

thunderous-kick.name: thunderous-kick
thunderous-kick.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
thunderous-kick.flavorText: The user overwhelms the target with lightning-like movement before delivering a kick. This also lowers the target's Defense stat.

glacial-lance.name: glacial-lance
glacial-lance.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
glacial-lance.flavorText: The user attacks by hurling a blizzard-cloaked icicle lance at opposing Pokémon.

astral-barrage.name: astral-barrage
astral-barrage.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
astral-barrage.flavorText: The user attacks by sending a frightful amount of small ghosts at opposing Pokémon.

eerie-spell.name: eerie-spell
eerie-spell.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
eerie-spell.flavorText: The user attacks with its tremendous psychic power. This also drains 3 PP from the move last used by the target.

dire-claw.name: dire-claw
dire-claw.flavorText: The user lashes out at the target with ruinous claws. This may also leave the target poisoned, paralyzed, or asleep.

psyshield-bash.name: psyshield-bash
psyshield-bash.flavorText: Cloaking itself in psychic energy, the user slams into the target. This also boosts the user’s Defense stat.

stone-axe.name: stone-axe
stone-axe.flavorText: The user swings its stone axes at the target. Stone splinters left behind by this attack float around the target.

springtide-storm.name: springtide-storm
springtide-storm.flavorText: The user attacks by wrapping opposing Pokémon in fierce winds brimming with love and hate. This may also lower their Attack stats.

mystical-power.name: mystical-power
mystical-power.flavorText: The user attacks by emitting a mysterious power. This also boosts the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

raging-fury.name: raging-fury
raging-fury.flavorText: The user rampages around spewing flames for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

wave-crash.name: wave-crash
wave-crash.flavorText: The user shrouds itself in water and slams into the target with its whole body to inflict damage. This also damages the user quite a lot.

chloroblast.name: chloroblast
chloroblast.flavorText: The user launches its amassed chlorophyll to inflict damage on the target. This also damages the user.

mountain-gale.name: mountain-gale
mountain-gale.flavorText: The user hurls giant chunks of ice at the target to inflict damage. This may also make the target flinch.

victory-dance.name: victory-dance
victory-dance.flavorText: The user performs an intense dance to usher in victory, boosting its Attack, Defense, and Speed stats.

headlong-rush.name: headlong-rush
headlong-rush.flavorText: The user smashes into the target in a full-body tackle. This also lowers the user’s Defense and Sp. Def stats.

barb-barrage.name: barb-barrage
barb-barrage.flavorText: The user launches countless toxic barbs to inflict damage. This may also poison the target. This move’s power is doubled if the target is already poisoned.

esper-wing.name: esper-wing
esper-wing.flavorText: The user slashes the target with aura-enriched wings. This also boosts the user's Speed stat. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

bitter-malice.name: bitter-malice
bitter-malice.flavorText: The user attacks the target with spine-chilling resentment. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.

shelter.name: shelter
shelter.flavorText: The user makes its skin as hard as an iron shield, sharply boosting its Defense stat.

triple-arrows.name: triple-arrows
triple-arrows.flavorText: The user kicks, then fires three arrows. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit and may also lower the target’s Defense stat or make it flinch.

infernal-parade.name: infernal-parade
infernal-parade.flavorText: The user attacks with myriad fireballs. This may also leave the target with a burn. This move's power is doubled if the target has a status condition.

ceaseless-edge.name: ceaseless-edge
ceaseless-edge.flavorText: The user slashes its shell blade at the target. Shell splinters left behind by this attack remain scattered under the target as spikes.

bleakwind-storm.name: bleakwind-storm
bleakwind-storm.flavorText: The user attacks with savagely cold winds that cause both body and spirit to tremble. This may also lower the Speed stats of opposing Pokémon.

wildbolt-storm.name: wildbolt-storm
wildbolt-storm.flavorText: The user summons a thunderous tempest and savagely attacks with lightning and wind. This may also leave opposing Pokémon with paralysis.

sandsear-storm.name: sandsear-storm
sandsear-storm.flavorText: The user attacks by wrapping opposing Pokémon in fierce winds and searingly hot sand. This may also leave them with a burn.

lunar-blessing.name: lunar-blessing
lunar-blessing.flavorText: The user receives a blessing from the crescent moon, restoring HP and curing status conditions for itself and its ally Pokémon currently in the battle.

take-heart.name: take-heart
take-heart.flavorText: The user lifts its spirits, curing its own status conditions and boosting its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

tera-blast.name: tera-blast
tera-blast.flavorText: If the user has Terastallized, it unleashes energy of its Tera Type. This move inflicts damage using the Attack or Sp. Atk stat—whichever is higher for the user.

silk-trap.name: silk-trap
silk-trap.flavorText: The user spins a silken trap, protecting itself from damage while lowering the Speed stat of any attacker that makes direct contact.

axe-kick.name: axe-kick
axe-kick.flavorText: The user attacks by kicking up into the air and slamming its heel down upon the target. This may also confuse the target. If it misses, the user takes damage instead.

last-respects.name: last-respects
last-respects.flavorText: The user attacks to avenge its allies. The more defeated allies there are in the user's party, the greater the move's power.

lumina-crash.name: lumina-crash
lumina-crash.flavorText: The user attacks by unleashing a peculiar light that even affects the mind. This also harshly lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.

order-up.name: order-up
order-up.flavorText: The user attacks with elegant poise. If the user has a Tatsugiri in its mouth, this move boosts one of the user's stats based on the Tatsugiri's form.

jet-punch.name: jet-punch
jet-punch.flavorText: The user summons a torrent around its fist and punches at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

spicy-extract.name: spicy-extract
spicy-extract.flavorText: The user emits an incredibly spicy extract, sharply boosting the target's Attack stat and harshly lowering the target's Defense stat.

spin-out.name: spin-out
spin-out.flavorText: The user spins furiously by straining its legs, inflicting damage on the target. This also harshly lowers the user's Speed stat.

population-bomb.name: population-bomb
population-bomb.flavorText: The user’s fellows gather in droves to perform a combo attack that hits the target one to ten times in a row.

ice-spinner.name: ice-spinner
ice-spinner.flavorText: The user covers its feet in thin ice and twirls around, slamming into the target. This move's spinning motion also destroys the terrain.

glaive-rush.name: glaive-rush
glaive-rush.flavorText: The user throws its entire body into a reckless charge. After this move is used, attacks on the user cannot miss and will inflict double damage until the user’s next turn.

revival-blessing.name: revival-blessing
revival-blessing.flavorText: The user bestows a loving blessing, reviving a party Pokémon that has fainted and restoring half that Pokémon's max HP.

salt-cure.name: salt-cure
salt-cure.flavorText: The user salt cures the target, inflicting damage every turn. Steel and Water types are more strongly affected by this move.

triple-dive.name: triple-dive
triple-dive.flavorText: The user performs a perfectly timed triple dive, hitting the target with splashes of water three times in a row.

mortal-spin.name: mortal-spin
mortal-spin.flavorText: The user performs a spin attack that can also eliminate the effects of such moves as Bind, Wrap, and Leech Seed. This also poisons opposing Pokémon.

doodle.name: doodle
doodle.flavorText: The user captures the very essence of the target in a sketch. This changes the Abilities of the user and its ally Pokémon to that of the target.

fillet-away.name: fillet-away
fillet-away.flavorText: The user sharply boosts its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats by using its own HP.

kowtow-cleave.name: kowtow-cleave
kowtow-cleave.flavorText: The user slashes at the target after kowtowing to make the target let down its guard. This attack never misses.

flower-trick.name: flower-trick
flower-trick.flavorText: The user throws a rigged bouquet of flowers at the target. This attack never misses and always lands a critical hit.

torch-song.name: torch-song
torch-song.flavorText: The user blows out raging flames as if singing a song, scorching the target. This also boosts the user's Sp. Atk stat.

aqua-step.name: aqua-step
aqua-step.flavorText: The user toys with the target and attacks it using light and fluid dance steps. This also boosts the user's Speed stat.

raging-bull.name: raging-bull
raging-bull.flavorText: The user performs a tackle like a raging bull. This move's type depends on the user's form. It can also break barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.

make-it-rain.name: make-it-rain
make-it-rain.flavorText: The user attacks by throwing out a mass of coins. This also lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat. Money is earned after the battle.

psyblade.name: psyblade
psyblade.flavorText: The user rends the target with an ethereal blade. This move's power is boosted by 50 percent if the user is on Electric Terrain.

hydro-steam.name: hydro-steam
hydro-steam.flavorText: The user blasts the target with boiling-hot water. This move's power is not lowered in harsh sunlight but rather boosted by 50 percent.

ruination.name: ruination
ruination.flavorText: The user summons a ruinous disaster. This cuts the target’s HP in half.

collision-course.name: collision-course
collision-course.flavorText: The user transforms and crashes to the ground, causing a massive prehistoric explosion. This move's power is boosted more than usual if it’s a supereffective hit.

electro-drift.name: electro-drift
electro-drift.flavorText: The user races forward at ultrafast speeds, piercing its target with futuristic electricity. This move's power is boosted more than usual if it's a supereffective hit.

shed-tail.name: shed-tail
shed-tail.flavorText: The user creates a substitute for itself using its own HP before switching places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

tidy-up.name: tidy-up
tidy-up.flavorText: The user tidies up and removes the effects of Spikes, Stealth Rock, Sticky Web, Toxic Spikes, and Substitute. This also boosts the user’s Attack and Speed stats.

snowscape.name: snowscape
snowscape.flavorText: The user summons a snowstorm lasting five turns. This boosts the Defense stats of Ice types.

pounce.name: pounce
pounce.flavorText: The user attacks by pouncing on the target. This also lowers the target's Speed stat.

trailblaze.name: trailblaze
trailblaze.flavorText: The user attacks suddenly as if leaping out from tall grass. The user's nimble footwork boosts its Speed stat.

chilling-water.name: chilling-water
chilling-water.flavorText: The user attacks the target by showering it with water that's so cold it saps the target's power. This also lowers the target's Attack stat.

hyper-drill.name: hyper-drill
hyper-drill.flavorText: The user spins the pointed part of its body at high speed to pierce the target. This attack can hit a target using a move such as Protect or Detect.

twin-beam.name: twin-beam
twin-beam.flavorText: The user shoots mystical beams from its eyes to inflict damage. The target is hit twice in a row.

rage-fist.name: rage-fist
rage-fist.flavorText: The user converts its rage into energy to attack. The more times the user has been hit by attacks, the greater the move's power.

armor-cannon.name: armor-cannon
armor-cannon.flavorText: The user shoots its own armor out as blazing projectiles. This also lowers the user’s Defense and Sp. Def stats.

bitter-blade.name: bitter-blade
bitter-blade.flavorText: The user focuses its bitter feelings toward the world of the living into a slashing attack. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

double-shock.name: double-shock
double-shock.flavorText: The user discharges all the electricity from its body to perform a high-damage attack. After using this move, the user will no longer be Electric type.

gigaton-hammer.name: gigaton-hammer
gigaton-hammer.flavorText: The user swings its whole body around to attack with its huge hammer. This move can't be used twice in a row.

comeuppance.name: comeuppance
comeuppance.flavorText: The user retaliates with much greater force against the opponent that last inflicted damage on it.

aqua-cutter.name: aqua-cutter
aqua-cutter.flavorText: The user expels pressurized water to cut at the target like a blade. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

blood-moon.name: blood-moon
blood-moon.flavorText: The user unleashes the full brunt of its spirit from a full moon that shines as red as blood. This move can't be used twice in a row.

matcha-gotcha.name: matcha-gotcha
matcha-gotcha.flavorText: The user fires a blast of tea that it mixed. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

syrup-bomb.name: syrup-bomb
syrup-bomb.flavorText: The user sets off an explosion of sticky candy syrup, which coats the target and causes the target's Speed stat to drop each turn for three turns.

ivy-cudgel.name: ivy-cudgel
ivy-cudgel.flavorText: The user strikes with an ivy-wrapped cudgel. This move's type changes depending on the mask worn by the user, and it has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

electro-shot.name: electro-shot
electro-shot.flavorText: The user gathers electricity on the first turn, boosting its Sp. Atk stat, then fires a high-voltage shot on the next turn. The shot will be fired immediately in rain.

tera-starstorm.name: tera-starstorm
tera-starstorm.flavorText: With the power of its crystals, the user bombards and eliminates the target. When used by Terapagos in its Stellar Form, this move damages all opposing Pokémon.

fickle-beam.name: fickle-beam
fickle-beam.flavorText: The user shoots a beam of light to inflict damage. Sometimes all the user's heads shoot beams in unison, doubling the move's power.

burning-bulwark.name: burning-bulwark
burning-bulwark.flavorText: The user's intensely hot fur protects it from attacks and also burns any attacker that makes direct contact with it.

thunderclap.name: thunderclap
thunderclap.flavorText: This move enables the user to attack first with a jolt of electricity. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack.

mighty-cleave.name: mighty-cleave
mighty-cleave.flavorText: The user wields the light that has accumulated atop its head to cleave the target. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

tachyon-cutter.name: tachyon-cutter
tachyon-cutter.flavorText: The user attacks by launching particle blades at the target twice in a row. This attack never misses.

hard-press.name: hard-press
hard-press.flavorText: The target is crushed with an arm, a claw, or the like to inflict damage. The more HP the target has left, the greater the move's power.

dragon-cheer.name: dragon-cheer
dragon-cheer.flavorText: The user raises its allies’ morale with a draconic cry so that their future attacks have a heightened chance of landing critical hits. This rouses Dragon types more.

alluring-voice.name: alluring-voice
alluring-voice.flavorText: The user attacks the target using its angelic voice. This also confuses the target if its stats have been boosted during the turn.

temper-flare.name: temper-flare
temper-flare.flavorText: Spurred by desperation, the user attacks the target. This move's power is doubled if the user's previous move failed.

supercell-slam.name: supercell-slam
supercell-slam.flavorText: The user electrifies its body and drops onto the target to inflict damage. If this move misses, the user takes damage instead.

psychic-noise.name: psychic-noise
psychic-noise.flavorText: The user attacks the target with unpleasant sound waves. For two turns, the target is prevented from recovering HP through moves, Abilities, or held items.

upper-hand.name: upper-hand
upper-hand.flavorText: The user reacts to the target's movement and strikes with the heel of its palm, making the target flinch. This move fails if the target is not readying a priority move.

malignant-chain.name: malignant-chain
malignant-chain.flavorText: The user pours toxins into the target by wrapping them in a toxic, corrosive chain. This may also leave the target badly poisoned.

shadow-rush.name: shadow-rush
shadow-rush.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move while in hyper mode.
shadow-rush.shortEffect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit in Hyper Mode.

shadow-blast.name: shadow-blast
shadow-blast.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
shadow-blast.shortEffect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

shadow-blitz.name: shadow-blitz
shadow-blitz.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

shadow-bolt.name: shadow-bolt
shadow-bolt.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.
shadow-bolt.shortEffect: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

shadow-break.name: shadow-break
shadow-break.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

shadow-chill.name: shadow-chill
shadow-chill.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
shadow-chill.shortEffect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

shadow-end.name: shadow-end
shadow-end.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/2 of its current HP in recoil.
shadow-end.shortEffect: User receives 1/2 its HP in recoil.

shadow-fire.name: shadow-fire
shadow-fire.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
shadow-fire.shortEffect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

shadow-rave.name: shadow-rave
shadow-rave.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

shadow-storm.name: shadow-storm
shadow-storm.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

shadow-wave.name: shadow-wave
shadow-wave.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

shadow-down.name: shadow-down
shadow-down.effect: Lowers the target’s Defense by two stages.
shadow-down.shortEffect: Lowers the target’s Defense by two stages.

shadow-half.name: shadow-half
shadow-half.effect: Halves HP of all Pokémon on the field.  User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.
shadow-half.shortEffect: Halves HP of all Pokémon on the field.  Must recharge

shadow-hold.name: shadow-hold
shadow-hold.effect:
The target cannot switch out normally.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.  This effect ends when the user leaves the field.

The target may still escape by using baton pass, u turn, or a shed shell.

Both the user and the target pass on this effect with baton pass.
shadow-hold.shortEffect: Prevents the target from leaving battle.

shadow-mist.name: shadow-mist
shadow-mist.effect: Lowers the target’s evasion by two stages.
shadow-mist.shortEffect: Lowers the target’s evasion by two stages.

shadow-shed.name: shadow-shed
shadow-shed.effect: Removes the effects of light screen, reflect, and safeguard.
shadow-shed.shortEffect: Removes Light Screen, Reflect, and Safeguard.

shadow-sky.name: shadow-sky
shadow-sky.effect: Changes the weather to Shadow Sky for five turns.  Pokémon other than shadow Pokémon take 1/16 their max HP at the end of every turn.  This move is typeless for the purposes of weather ball.
shadow-sky.shortEffect: Changes the weather to Shadow Sky for five turns.
